cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around Mezcal, Cognac, Punt e Mes—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 22.5ml of Mezcal, 22.5ml of Cognac, 30ml of Punt e Mes, 15ml of Luxardo Maraschino, and 2 dashes of Creole Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: 20th Century
cocktails.description: The 20th Century cocktail is a classic cocktail that was first created in 1937 by a British bartender C.A. Tuck and named in honor of the celebrated 20th Century limited train which ran between New York City and Chicago. IT's a sophisticated and elegant drink that combines London Dry Gin, Lillet Blanc (a French aperitif wine), Lime Juice, and Creme de Cacao White.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 20ml of Lillet Blanc, 20ml of Creme de Cacao White, and 10ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express an Orange zest twist over the cocktail and use it as garnish.

cocktails.description: This cocktail is similar to the cuba libre and may refer to any drink consisting of Whiskey mixed with Lemon soft drink. It was originally made with Seagram's seven crown Whiskey, but any Whiskey can be used.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Whiskey and150ml of 7-Up.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: ABC
cocktails.description: The abbreviation stands for Amaretto, Baileys and Cognac.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of Amaretto into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Baileys on top of the Amaretto.
3. Using a teaspoon, pour 15ml of Cognac on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: Acapulco
cocktails.description: A Tropical long drink that combines Tequila and White Rum with Pineapple and Grapefruit Juice, balanced by fresh Lime Juice and a touch of Simple Syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Tequila Blanco, 50ml of White Rum, 75ml of Pineapple Juice, 50ml of Grapefruit Juice, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 10ml of Simple Syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass over fresh ice.

cocktails.name: Adonis
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail created in 1884 and named after the first broadway musical to run for more than 500 performances. The ratio of sherry and Vermouth may be varied to make the cocktail sweeter or drier accordingly.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Amontillado Sherry, 45ml of Red Vermouth, and 2 dashes of Orange Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with Orange zest.

cocktails.name: Adriatique
cocktails.description: A Complex Liqueur cocktail where Amaro Nonino and Aperol meet citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Amaro Nonino, 15ml of Aperol, and 30ml of Orange Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Orange.

cocktails.name: Affogato cocktail
cocktails.description: A Rich, dessert-style blended cocktail inspired by affogato, combining Grappa, Coffee Liqueur, crème de cacao, Espresso, and ice Cream for a creamy, boozy coffee treat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients with three cubes of ice.
2. Pour into a chilled glass.
3. Garnish with 3 Coffee Beans floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail’s foamy head.

cocktails.name: After Eight
cocktails.description: Inspired by the classic Mint Chocolate thin, the after eight cocktail is a rich, indulgent dessert drink that can be served as a sophisticated Martini or a fun layered shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the Coffee Liqueur into the bottom of a shot glass.
2. Carefully float the crème de menthe over the back of a spoon to create a distinct layer.
3. Slowly layer the Irish Cream on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktails.name: Agavoni
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around Tequila Blanco, Red Vermouth, Campari—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Tequila Blanco, 30ml of Red Vermouth, and 30ml of Campari.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an Orange slice.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (long)
cocktails.description: A bold and fruity southern classic combining Southern Comfort, Amaretto, and Sloe Gin, topped with Orange Juice. Sweet, rich, and deceptively strong, with a smooth almond and stone-fruit depth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Southern Comfort, 20ml of Amaretto, 20ml of Sloe Gin, 90ml of Orange Juice, and 10ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a collins glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an Orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (shot)
cocktails.description: A classic southern party shot made with Amaretto, Southern Comfort, and Sloe Gin, balanced with Orange Juice. Sweet, fruity, and deceptively strong.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 servings:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Southern Comfort, 45ml of Amaretto, 45ml of Sloe Gin, 22.5ml of Orange Juice, and 22.5ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.description: A classic, rich, and velvety cocktail combining Gin, white crème de cacao, and Cream. The alexander is smooth, lightly sweet, and dessert-like, with subtle Chocolate notes balanced by botanical Gin and a luxurious, silky texture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Gin, 22.5ml of Creme de Cacao White, 22.5ml of Cream, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of Nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Alexander the Great
cocktails.description: A Luxurious, dessert-style cocktail that blends smooth Vodka with rich Coffee Liqueur and white crème de cacao, finished with fresh Cream for a silky, indulgent texture and gentle Chocolate-coffee sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Vodka, 15ml of Coffee Liqueur, 15ml of Creme de Cacao White, 22.5ml of Cream and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of Cocoa Powder and/or a pinch of Chocolate.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Big Brother
cocktails.description: A Decadent, creamy Gin-based cocktail combining Gin, Triple Sec, and Blue Curaçao. Silky, dessert-like, and indulgent, with a subtle citrus brightness and a striking color. Garnished with Physalis for a lightly tart contrast.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Gin, 7.5ml of Triple Sec, 22.5ml of Blue Curaçao, 22.5ml of Cream, 5ml of Rich Simple Syrup, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a Physalis.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Sister
cocktails.description: A classic creamy Gin cocktail with bright green crème de menthe and smooth Cream, creating a dessert-like balance of herbal freshness and silky sweetness. Elegant, refreshing, and indulgent, often served as an after-dinner drink and garnished with fresh Mint or grated Nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Gin, 15ml of Creme de Menthe Green, 15ml of Cream, 5ml of Rich Simple Syrup, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Mint leaf and a pinch of Nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Alien Brain Haemorrhage
cocktails.description: A Visually striking layered shooter that looks like a floating brain in liquid. Sweet Peach Schnapps forms the base, creamy Baileys curdles into brain-like shapes, and a splash of Blue Curaçao or Grenadine adds an eerie, bloody effect. Smooth, sweet, and slightly citrusy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour Peach Schnapps into a chilled shooter glass as the base.
2. Slowly drip Baileys Irish Cream into the schnapps using a spoon or the back of a straw so it curdles and forms."brain" shapes.
3. Gently add a few drops of Blue Curaçao and Grenadine on top to create a bleeding effect.
4. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktails.name: Alien Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Blue Curaçao into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20ml of Baileys(Irish Cream Liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5ml of Grenadine, one drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktails.name: Alpine Avenger
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy dessert cocktail combining the cool freshness of Peppermint Schnapps with the smooth sweetness of white crème de cacao and Milk. Velvety, chocolatey, and refreshing at the same time, it tastes like a liquid Mint Chocolate dessert served warm or chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add Peppermint Schnapps and white crème de cacao into a heat-resistant glass or Irish coffee glass.
2. Heat the Milk gently until hot but not boiling.
3. Pour the hot Milk into the glass and stir gently to combine all ingredients.
4. Garnish with grated Chocolate, Chocolate shavings, or a light dusting of Cocoa Powder.
5. Serve immediately while warm and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Amado
cocktails.description: A Rich and silky Rum-based cocktail with delicate floral sweetness from Rose Syrup and a velvety texture from Egg White. Elegant, dessert-like, and indulgently smooth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of White Rum, 20ml of Lime Juice, 15ml of Rose Syrup, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a drop of angostura bitter.

cocktails.name: Amalia
cocktails.description: A Light, sparkling Rum cocktail designed for effortless sipping. Fresh Kiwi fruit, Lime and floral elderflower are balanced by White Rum and lifted with bubbly mixers over ice, finished with a cooling Mint garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Cut Kiwi fruit in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker.
2. IN a shaker, muddle fresh Kiwi fruit pieces to release Juice and aroma.
3. Add 50ml of White Rum, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 30ml of Elderflower Cordial to the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with ice and shake briefly to combine and chill.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Top gently with Ginger Ale.
7. Give a light stir to integrate the layers without losing bubbles.
8. Garnish with a fresh Mint sprig and a thin slice of Kiwi fruit.

cocktails.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktails.description: A classic balance of sweet and sour, the Amaretto sour combines rich almond Liqueur with fresh Lemon Juice for a smooth, slightly nutty cocktail with a bright citrus edge. Soft, approachable, and dangerously drinkable, it is traditionally garnished with a cherry for a touch of fruit sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Amaretto and30ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an ice cube.
5. Garnish with 3 maraschino cherries and an Orange slice.

cocktails.name: Amaro Paloma
cocktails.description: A refreshing, bittersweet twist on the classic paloma, combining the herbal complexity of Amaro Nonino with crisp Tequila and bright Grapefruit, topped with sparkling soda for a long, balanced and highly drinkable cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Tequila Blanco, 22.5ml of Amaro Nonino, 30ml of Grapefruit Juice, 30ml of Lime Juice, 5ml of Simple Syrup, 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters, and 10ml of Soda Water.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with a Grapefruit slice.

cocktails.name: Ambassador
cocktails.description: A Bright and approachable Tequila long drink that blends smooth blanco Tequila with fresh Orange Juice, lightly sweetened with Simple Syrup. The result is a crisp, citrus-forward cocktail with a gentle agave backbone and a refreshing, sunny character. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Tequila Blanco, 90ml of Orange Juice, and 5ml of Simple Syrup.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange slice.

cocktails.name: American Trilogy
cocktails.description: A bold yet balanced Whiskey-forward cocktail combining Applejack, Rye Whiskey, and Demerara Sugar Syrup. It offers a crisp Apple note, spicy rye backbone, and rich caramel sweetness, finished with an expressive citrus garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Applejack, 30ml of Rye Whiskey, 10ml of Demerara Sugar Syrup and2 dashes of Orange Bitters.
3. Shake for 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an ice cube.
5. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.description: Bitter Campari and sweet Vermouth lengthened with fizzy soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Campari, 30ml of Red Vermouth, and top with Soda Water.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange slice and a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: AMF
cocktails.description: Amf (adios motherf***er) is a famously potent long drink that combines several white spirits with citrus and Cola. Despite its bright, almost innocent look, it delivers a powerful punch and is known as a party classic in bars and clubs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 15ml of Vodka, 15ml of White Rum, 15ml of Tequila Blanco, 15ml of Gin, 15ml of Blue Curaçao, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Simple Syrup, and 60ml of Lemon-Lime Soda.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Anaconda
cocktails.description: This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 75ml of Jack Daniels and75ml of Sambuca.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Angel Face
cocktails.description: Equal-parts mix of Gin, Apricot Brandy, and Calvados.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 30ml of Apricot Brandy, and 30ml of Calvados.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Angel's Tit
cocktails.description: A classic creamy layered shooter made with Creme de Cacao Brown, maraschino Liqueur, and fresh Cream. Sweet, silky, and dessert-like, with a visual contrast of dark Chocolate and white Cream, traditionally garnished with a cherry on top.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a shooter glass to help keep the layers well defined.
2. Carefully pour the Creme de Cacao Brown into the bottom of the glass.
3. Slowly layer the maraschino Liqueur over the back of a spoon so it sits above the cacao.
4. Gently float the Cream on top, again using the back of a spoon to create a clean white layer.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry placed in the center of the Cream layer.
6. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktails.name: Another Sunken Boat
cocktails.description: A Dark, spirit-forward agave cocktail where smoky Mezcal meets the bitter-sweet complexity of Punt e Mes and the lush cherry richness of cherry Heering. Deep, aromatic, and slightly brooding, this drink is layered with herbal bitterness, gentle sweetness, and lingering smoke. Designed for slow sipping and quiet contemplation, it is finished with a Maraschino cherry for a subtle, nostalgic touch.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Mezcal, 22.5ml of Punt e Mes, 15ml of cherry Heering, and 1 dash of Absinthe.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.description: Bittersweet aperitif of Prosecco, Aperol, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with ice.
2. Add 90ml of Prosecco, 60ml of Aperol, and 30ml of Soda Water.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Apple Cart
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Brandy cocktail built around Calvados and Triple Sec, delivering deep Apple aromatics, gentle citrus sweetness, and a warm, lingering finish. Elegant, bold, and designed for slow sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Calvados, 30ml of Triple Sec, and 30ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an Apple wedge.

cocktails.name: Apple Sunrise
cocktails.description: A Layered, spirit-forward Brandy cocktail built around Calvados and Creme de Cassis, softened by fresh Apple Juice. Deeply aromatic, gently sweet, and visually striking, it balances orchard fruit, dark Berries, and subtle oak warmth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 100ml of Apple Juice, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Creme de Cassis, and 50ml of Calvados.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with an Apple wedge and a Lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Appletini
cocktails.description: A Crisp, spirit-forward Vodka cocktail with bright green Apple notes and a subtle citrus lift from Cointreau. Clean, aromatic, and deceptively smooth, the appletini balances sharp freshness with a gentle sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Vodka, 15ml of Apple Schnapps, and 15ml of Cointreau.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with an Apple slice.

cocktails.name: Asian Hooker
cocktails.description: A Bright, tropical long drink with a playful sweetness and a smooth Rum backbone. Overproof Rum brings warmth and depth, Coconut Rum adds creamy softness, and midori gives a fresh melon note, all lifted by sparkling mixers over ice for an easy, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with ice.
2. Add 10ml of Overproof Rum, 45ml of Coconut Rum, 15ml of Midori Melon Liqueur, 80ml of Pineapple Juice, and 80ml of Lemon-Lime Soda.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Aussie Boomerang
cocktails.description: A smooth, creamy shooter combining bright Kiwi fruit and melon liqueurs with rich Cream. Sweet, fruity, and dessert-like, it’s a playful, easy-drinking shot with a soft tropical finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a shooter glass in advance for a cleaner, smoother taste.
2. Pour the Kiwi fruit Liqueur into the glass as the first layer.
3. Slowly add the Melon Liqueur over the back of a spoon to create a distinct layer.
4. Gently float the Cream on top using a spoon to achieve a clean layered effect.
5. Serve immediately and drink in one smooth shot.

cocktails.name: Avenue San Martin
cocktails.description: A Bright and balanced Brandy-style sour that brings together Pisco, Amaro and Honey, lifted by fresh citrus and a gentle sweetness for a crisp, refreshing finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Pisco, 15ml of Amaro, 15ml of Honey Syrup, 20ml of Lime Juice, and 2.5ml of Ginger Syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Aviation
cocktails.description: A Floral Gin sour with maraschino and Lemon, tinted by crème de violette.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Gin, 15ml of Luxardo Maraschino, 15ml of Lemon Juice, and 1 bar spoon of Creme de Violette.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a twist of Lemon.

cocktails.name: B-52
cocktails.description: The name of this IBA official cocktail refers to the us b-52 stratofortress long-range bomber.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua into a shooter glass.
2. Very carefully pour Baileys on top of the Kahlua, followed by Grand Marnier.
3. Serve flamed, and drink flamed using a long straw.

cocktails.name: B-54
cocktails.description: A Popular variation of the b-52 shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully layer 20ml of Amaretto on top using the back of a spoon.
3. Gently layer 20ml of Baileys on top to finish.

cocktails.name: B-55
cocktails.description: A Popular variation of the b-52 shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua or another Coffee Liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the Kahlua.
3. Very carefully pour 15ml of Absinthe on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: B&B
cocktails.description: A classic, spirit-forward cocktail that blends rich Brandy with herbal, honeyed bénédictine. Smooth, warming, and deeply aromatic, the b & b is designed for slow sipping and quiet appreciation.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Brandy and60ml of Benedictine.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled snifter.

cocktails.name: Baby Guinness
cocktails.description: This layered shooter was named for its appearance — it looks like a tiny glass of stout. The Baileys can also be whipped and spooned on top, for a frothy presentation.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of Coffee Liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Irish Cream Liqueur on top.

cocktails.name: Bacardi Cocktail
cocktails.description: A classic Rum sour cocktail that combines crisp White Rum with fresh Lime Juice and Grenadine, creating a perfectly balanced drink that is both tart and gently sweet with a vibrant pink hue.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of White Rum, 20ml of Lime Juice, and 10ml of Grenadine.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Lime and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Bad Word
cocktails.description: A bold and layered Gin cocktail where London Dry Gin, Green Chartreuse and Aperol collide with fresh citrus. Herbal, bitter and bright at the same time, it’s a complex, structured drink with a long, slightly medicinal finish, lifted by Orange oils.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 30ml of Green Chartreuse, 30ml of Aperol or Gran Classico, and 30ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Orange.

cocktails.name: Bahama Mama
cocktails.description: A classic caribbean-style cocktail combining White Rum, Coconut Rum, and cherry Brandy with Pineapple and Orange juices for a smooth, fruity, and sun-soaked tropical experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of White Rum, 30ml of Coconut Rum, 15ml of cherry Brandy, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 60ml of Orange Juice, 60ml of Pineapple Juice, and 10ml of Grenadine.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a slice of Pineapple.

cocktails.name: Bali Rum Trader
cocktails.description: A Lush, tropical Rum cocktail inspired by southeast asian flavors. White Rum forms a clean, crisp base, while Pisang Ambon brings sweet Banana depth and Pineapple Juice adds bright acidity. The result is a smooth, aromatic drink that balances fruitiness with gentle strength, finished with a playful Banana garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of White Rum, 25ml of Pisang Ambon, and 25ml of Pineapple Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Banana.

cocktails.name: Bali Trader
cocktails.description: The bali trader is a vibrant, exotic cocktail characterized by its tropical fusion of Banana and Pineapple flavours.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Vodka, 25ml of Banana Liqueur Green, and 25ml of Pineapple Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Banana slice.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Classic
cocktails.description: A Refined, low-ABV classic that showcases the Dry, nutty character of sherry balanced with herbal Vermouth and bright Orange Bitters. Elegant, crisp, and quietly complex, with a refreshing citrus lift from the Lemon garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Fino Sherry, 50ml of Dry Vermouth, 2 dashes of Orange Bitters, and 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Modern
cocktails.description: A Modern, aromatic twist on the classic bamboo cocktail. Dry sherry forms the backbone, layered with both red and Dry Vermouth for herbal depth, while fresh citrus brightens the profile. Balanced, complex, and elegantly bittersweet, finished with an expressive Orange garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Amontillado Sherry, 15ml of Red Vermouth, 15ml of Dry Vermouth, 15ml of Bianco Vermouth, and 1 dash of Orange Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
5. Express an Orange peel over the drink, garnish, and serve.

cocktails.name: Banana Calling
cocktails.description: A Bright and aromatic Gin sour balancing botanical Gin, Dry sherry and ripe Banana Liqueur with fresh citrus and a subtle touch of sweetness for a crisp yet tropical sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Gin, 10ml of Amontillado Sherry, 15ml of Banana Liqueur, 20ml of Lemon Juice, and 10ml of Simple Syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Banana or a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Banana Colada
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical cocktail combining White Rum, Coconut Syrup, and Banana Liqueur for a smooth, sweet, and beach-style flavour profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a blender with ice.
2. Add White Rum, Banana Liqueur, Coconut Syrup, and fresh Pineapple Juice.
3. Blend until smooth and slightly frothy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass filled with fresh ice.
5. Garnish with a Banana slice, Pineapple wedge, or a cherry and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A smooth and tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, combining White Rum with ripe Banana and fresh Lime Juice. The natural sweetness of Banana balances the sharp citrus, creating a creamy, refreshing cocktail with a bright caribbean character.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add White Rum, Banana Liqueur or fresh Banana, Lime Juice and Simple Syrup into a blender.
2. Add a generous handful of ice.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy with no large ice chunks remaining.
4. Taste and adjust sweetness or acidity if needed.
5. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
6. Garnish with a Banana slice or Lime wheel and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri (shaken)
cocktails.description: A Vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, combining Aged Rum with rich Banana Liqueur, fresh Lime Juice, and a hint of Bitters. The result is a smooth yet zesty cocktail with balanced sweetness, bright acidity, and a soft Banana aroma, finished with a clean, refreshing profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Aged Rum, 30ml of Banana Liqueur, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 6 drops of Daiquiri Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Banana.

cocktails.name: Banana Fantasy
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical mocktail with ripe Banana, Coconut Syrup, and bright citrus notes. Smooth, refreshing, and perfectly balanced between sweetness and freshness, served long for an easy, beach-style sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 1 Banana, 50ml of White Rum, 30ml of Coconut Syrup, and 100ml of Pineapple Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Banana Flash
cocktails.description: A Bright and tropical non-alcoholic cocktail with ripe Banana sweetness and a fresh, fruity character. Light, refreshing, and perfect for warm weather or as a fun, alcohol-free treat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add a Banana, a Peach, and 150ml of Orange Juice into a blender.
2. Add a handful of ice.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a Banana slice or citrus wedge and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bananarama
cocktails.description: A Bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features Banana Liqueur or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern creation, recipes vary significantly depending on the desired profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the Banana slices with the Cachaça and Rum in the base of a shaker.
2. Add all other ingredients and fill the shaker with ice.
3. Shake vigorously and fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Banshee
cocktails.description: This mild, sweet and creamy shot is named after a female spirit in Irish and Celtic folklore, who foretells the death of a family member of the person who hears her wailing screams. This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Creme de Banane, 50ml of Creme de Cacao White, and 50ml of Cream.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Barbara
cocktails.description: A smooth, dessert-style cocktail combining Vodka, white crème de cacao, and Milk. Sweet, creamy, and softly chocolatey, barbara is an indulgent after-dinner drink with a gentle kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Vodka, 22.5ml of Creme de Cacao White, and 45ml of Milk.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of Cocoa Powder and a pinch of Chocolate.

cocktails.name: Barracuda
cocktails.description: AN IBA official sparkling cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Gold Rum, 15ml of Galliano, 60ml of Pineapple Juice, and 15ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Top with 45ml of Sparkling Wine.
6. Garnish with a wedge of Pineapple and a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Basil Julep
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward twist on the classic julep, where fresh Basil replaces Mint to bring deep herbal notes and a slightly peppery aroma. Rich Bourbon forms the backbone, creating a smooth yet powerful cocktail that is both refreshing and complex. Garnished with fragrant Basil for an elegant, aromatic finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add fresh Basil leaves and Simple Syrup to a rocks glass.
2. Gently muddle the Basil to release its essential oils and aroma without shredding the leaves.
3. Pour in the Bourbon and fill the glass with crushed ice.
4. Stir gently until the drink is well chilled and slightly diluted.
5. Top with more crushed ice to form a small dome.
6. Garnish with a fresh Basil sprig and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Batida
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy brazilian cocktail made with Cachaça, Coconut Water, and Condensed Milk. Sweet, tropical, and dessert-like, with a smooth, velvety texture and gentle Rum warmth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Cachaça, 60ml of Coconut Water, 30ml of Condensed Milk, and 7.5ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of Lime.

cocktails.name: Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: A refreshing Vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Pineapple Juice—vibrant, fruity, and easy to savor. Garnished with a Pineapple wedge and cherries.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Vodka, 60ml of Pineapple Juice, and 90ml of Cranberry Juice.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Pineapple wedge and3 maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Beach Blonde
cocktails.description: A creamy, tropical indulgence that marries the velvety texture of Egg Liqueur with the bold heat of Overproof Rum. Balanced by fresh Banana and a splash of citrus, this long drink is a decadent treat reminiscent of a golden sunset on the coast.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Peel the fresh Banana and place it into a shaker.
2. Muddle the Banana thoroughly until it reaches a smooth, puree-like consistency.
3. Add 90ml of Egg Liqueur, 30ml of Overproof Rum, and 90ml of Orange Juice into the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds to ensure a creamy texture.
5. Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with fresh ice.
6. Garnish with a Banana slice and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.description: A Prohibition-era mix of Gin, Lemon, and Honey for a bright, silky sour.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Gin, 15ml of Honey Syrup, 25ml of Lemon Juice, and 25ml of Orange Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Lemon or Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bee's Nice
cocktails.description: A Long, Sparkling Wine drink built for easy sipping, pairing Everclear, Honey Syrup, Prosecco with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with Lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Everclear, 30ml of Lemon Juice, 30ml of Honey Syrup, and 45ml of Prosecco.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.description: Italian Sparkling Wine mixed with Peach purée for a light, fruity spritz.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 100ml of Champagne and50gr of Peach to a champagne flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Bentley
cocktails.description: A sophisticated classic that balances the crisp Apple notes of Calvados with the rich, botanical sweetness of Dubonnet. This elegant drink is smooth, aromatic, and perfectly rounded by a touch of citrus Bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a coupe with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Calvados, 45ml of Dubonnet, and 2 dashes of Orange Bitters.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange peel.

cocktails.name: Berlin Wall
cocktails.description: The mix of Tequila, Lime Juice, Falernum and Orange Bitters creates a brightness and depth that makes the berlin wall well worth a visit.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Tequila Reposado, 22.5ml of Falernum, 22.5ml of Lime Juice, 2 dashes of Orange Bitters, and 1 peel of Orange.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
cocktails.description: A Citrus-forward variation on the Sidecar with Cognac, Rum, and Triple Sec.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Cognac, 30ml of White Rum, 30ml of Triple Sec, and 20ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.description: First described in harry johnson's book 'bartender's manual', this herbal cocktail is a classic from the late 1800s. The original recipe had equal parts Gin, chartreuse and Vermouth, but it was adapted because many found that the chartreuse was too dominant.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Gin, 30ml of Red Vermouth, 20ml of Green Chartreuse, and 1 dash of Orange Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Bird of Paradise
cocktails.description: A Tropical Rum cocktail with Spiced Rum, Aperol, Pineapple Juice, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with Pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Spiced Rum, 22.5ml of Aperol, 45ml of Pineapple Juice, 15ml of Demerara Sugar Syrup, and 15ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with 3 leaves of Pineapple and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Bitter in Brazil
cocktails.description: A Tropical Rum cocktail with Cachaça, Orange Curaçao, Punt e Mes, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Cachaça, 22.5ml of Orange Curaçao, 22.5ml of Punt e Mes, 5ml of Rich Simple Syrup, 0.5 bar spoons of Fernet Branca, 15ml of Water, and 1 twist of Orange.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

cocktails.name: Black Lebowski
cocktails.description: Simple and spirit-forward blend of Vodka and Coffee Liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Vodka and30ml of Coffee Liqueur.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Blackberry Fig Smash
cocktails.description: A Bright agave spirit sour balancing Tequila Blanco, Agave Syrup, Blackberry with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with figs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Tequila Blanco, 30ml of Lime Juice, 30ml of Agave Syrup, 8 blackberries, and 1 Fig.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with half a Fig and5 g of Salt.

cocktails.name: Blood and Sand
cocktails.description: A Complex Whiskey cocktail where scotch Whiskey, Red Vermouth, cherry Brandy meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Scotch Whisky, 30ml of cherry Brandy, 30ml of Red Vermouth, and 30ml of Orange Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: A Savory Vodka cocktail with Tomato Juice, spices, and a peppery bite.
cocktails.instructions:
1. IN a mixing tin, add 45ml of Vodka, 90ml of Tomato Juice, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 2 dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, 2 dashes of Tabasco, a pinch of Celery Salt, and a pinch of Black Pepper.
2. Add plenty of ice to the tin with the ingredients.
3. Hold the second empty tin below and slightly to the side of the first one.
4. Pour the cocktail in a long, controlled stream from the first tin into the second tin.
let the liquid fall through the air— this aerates the drink and chills it gently.
5. Pour the liquid back into the first tin in the same way.
6. Repeat this back-and-forth “throw” 5 times.
the goal is to chill and lightly dilute the drink without over-diluting or bruising it.
7. Strain into a highball glass.
8. Garnish with a Celery stalk and a Lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Blow Job
cocktails.description: A Delicious and very popular shooter with controversial references.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Amaretto Liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the Amaretto.
3. Top with Whipped Cream.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii
cocktails.description: A Tropical Rum cocktail with White Rum, Vodka, Blue Curaçao, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 20ml of White Rum, 20ml of Vodka, 15ml of Blue Curaçao, 90ml of Pineapple Juice, 15ml of Lemon Juice, and 15ml of Simple Syrup into a blender.
2. Add crushed ice and blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a cherry and a Pineapple wedge.
5. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii Mocktail
cocktails.description: A Tropical mocktail with Pineapple Juice, Blue Curaçao Syrup, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 90ml of Pineapple Juice, 30ml of Orange Juice, 30ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Blue Curaçao Syrup, and 15ml of Simple Syrup into a blender.
2. Add crushed ice and blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a cherry and a Pineapple wedge.
5. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Jellyfish
cocktails.description: A Blue jellyfish is a visually striking, layered cocktail or shot designed to mimic the appearance of a jellyfish floating in the ocean. Its signature look comes from adding droplets of Cream to layered spirits, which then ."curdle" slightly or sink to form white tendrils that resemble jellyfish tentacles.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the Blue Curaçao into a glass first to create the deep blue base.
2. Slowly layer the Vodka and/or white Sambuca on top.
3. Add a few drops of Disaronno Velvet or Irish Cream(like Baileys) to the very top.

cocktails.name: Blue Kamikaze
cocktails.description: The shot variation of the IBA official kamikaze cocktail. The recipe here is for 3 shots. Blue kamikaze can also be made as a long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Vodka, 50ml of Blue Curaçao, and 50ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Blue Lady
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Gin drink featuring Blue Curaçao, Gin, Egg White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Blue Curaçao, 30ml of Gin, 20ml of Lemon Juice, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express oil from an Orange twist and garnish with it.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Blue Curaçao, Lemonade—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Lemon and cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Vodka, 30ml of Blue Curaçao, and 120ml of Lemonade.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon Mocktail
cocktails.description: A Bright mocktail balancing Lemonade and Blue Curaçao Syrup with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with Lemon and cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Orange Juice, 30ml of Blue Curaçao Syrup, and 120ml of Lemonade.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Blue Ocean
cocktails.description: A Bright Vodka sour balancing Vodka, Blue Curaçao, Grapefruit Juice with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Vodka, 15ml of Blue Curaçao, 15ml of Simple Syrup, and 60ml of Grapefruit Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled snifter glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an Orange slice.

cocktails.name: Blueberry Tea
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward spirit cocktail showcasing Amaretto, Grand Marnier, Black Tea—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Select and pre-heat an Irish coffee glass.
2. Pour all ingredients into pre-warmed glass.
3. Express Lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
4. Garnish with Cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: BMW
cocktails.description: The name is an acronym for Baileys, malibu, and Whiskey.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Baileys, 50ml of malibu, and 50ml of Whiskey.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Bobby Burns
cocktails.description: A Complex Whiskey cocktail where scotch Whiskey, Red Vermouth, Benedictine meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Scotch Whisky, 45ml of Red Vermouth, and 22.5ml of Benedictine.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a Lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Bolo Cocktail
cocktails.description: A Complex Rum cocktail where White Rum, Angostura Bitters meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of White Rum, 20ml of Lemon Juice, 10ml of Orange Juice, and 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Bombardino
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Brandy drink featuring Cognac, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the Liqueur: gently heat the Egg Liqueur in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. DO not let it boil, as this may cause the eggs to curdle.
2. Add Brandy: once hot, stir in the Brandy. Some recipes suggest heating the Brandy with the Liqueur, while others recommend adding it directly to the serving glass before pouring in the hot Liqueur.
3. Garnish: pour into a heat-resistant glass or mug. Top with a generous dollop of Whipped Cream and a sprinkle of Cinnamon or cocoa.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Calimero
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Brandy drink featuring Cognac, Advocaat, Espresso—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Warm the Advocaat and Espresso together in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add the Cognac to a heat-safe cup.
3. Pour the hot Advocaat-Espresso mixture over the Cognac and stir gently.
4. Top with Whipped Cream.
5. Finish with a dusting of Cinnamon and optional Cocoa Powder, then serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Pirata
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Rum drink featuring Gold Rum, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the Liqueur: pour the Egg Liqueur into a small saucepan. Heat it over medium-low heat until hot but not boiling (boiling may cause the Egg base to curdle).
2. Combine: in a heat-safe glass or small mug, add the Rum. Pour the hot Egg Liqueur over the Rum and stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish: top with a generous dollop of Whipped Cream.
4. Finish: sprinkle Cocoa Powder or Cinnamon on top and serve immediately while hot.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Scozzese
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Whiskey drink featuring Whisky, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Warm the Advocaat in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add the Whisky to a heat-safe cup.
3. Pour the hot Advocaat over the Whisky and stir gently to combine.
4. Top with Whipped Cream.
5. Sprinkle with Cinnamon and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.description: A Whiskey-based Negroni with Bourbon, sweet Vermouth, and Campari.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Bourbon, 30ml of Campari, and 30ml of Red Vermouth.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rock glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Peach Schnapps into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20ml of Baileys(Irish Cream Liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5ml of Grenadine, one drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.description: A Modern Gin sour swirled with Blackberry Liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Gin, 25ml of Lemon Juice, and 15ml of Creme de Mure.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Lemon and2 blackberries.

cocktails.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktails.description: A creamy blend of Cognac and Chocolate Liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Cognac or Brandy, 30ml of Creme de Cacao White and30ml of Cream.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of Nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Brandy Crusta
cocktails.description: A Citrusy Brandy cocktail with curaçao, maraschino, and Bitters served in a Sugar-crusted glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Cognac, 7.5ml of Luxardo Maraschino, 15ml of Orange Curaçao, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Simple Syrup, and 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass rimmed with Lemon Juice and caster Sugar.
5. Garnish with a twist of Lemon and5 g of Sugar.

cocktails.name: Brandy Daisy
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail that dates back to the 19th Century.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Brandy, 3 dashes of White Rum, 3 dashes of Orange Curaçao, 3 dashes of Simple Syrup, and 15ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Top with soda. 
6. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Brandy Eggnog
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Brandy drink featuring Brandy, Milk, Egg—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with Nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 40ml of Brandy, 50ml of Milk, 10ml of Simple Syrup, and an Egg Yolk into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of Nutmeg and a Cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: Brandy Sangaree
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and historical cocktail that balances the robust warmth of Cognac with the nutty, fortified sweetness of Tawny Port. A Touch of Rich Simple Syrup adds body, creating a silky, contemplative drink perfect for slow sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Cognac, 22.5ml of Tawny Port, and 5ml of Rich Simple Syrup.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

cocktails.name: Brandy Separator
cocktails.description: A Variation of the 'white lebowski', this cocktail is close to the 'sneaky pete', but smoother. The amount of Milk can be varied according to taste.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Brandy and22.5ml of Coffee Liqueur.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Brave Bull
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward agave spirit cocktail showcasing Tequila Blanco, Kahlua—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Tequila Blanco and30ml of Kahlua.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

cocktails.name: BRB
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Whiskey cocktail showcasing Bourbon, Root Beer—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Bourbon and180ml of Root Beer.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Breakfast Martini
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Gin cocktail showcasing Gin, Triple Sec, Orange Marmalade—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 50ml of Gin, 15ml of Triple Sec, 15ml of Lemon Juice, and 1 teaspoon of Orange Marmalade.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a tiny toast with Orange Marmalade.

cocktails.name: Bronx
cocktails.description: A classic Gin cocktail with sweet and Dry Vermouth brightened by Orange Juice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Gin, 15ml of Red Vermouth, 15ml of Dry Vermouth, and 30ml of Orange Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Buck's Fizz
cocktails.description: A Long drink of Orange Juice topped with Sparkling Wine.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 100ml of Sparkling Wine and50ml of Orange Juice to a champagne flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bull Shot
cocktails.description: This is a variation of the bloody mary that became a popular cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Vodka, 60ml of Beef Bouillon, 10ml of Lemon Juice, 1 dash of Worcestershire Sauce, 1 dash of Tabasco, 1 dash of Salt, and 1 dash of Black Pepper.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Celery stalk and a Lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Bullfrog
cocktails.description: A Strong and invigorating cocktail, something you'd want to order in a nightclub.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Vodka, 30ml of Gin, 30ml of White Rum, 30ml of Tequila Blanco, 30ml of Blue Curaçao, and 250ml of Red Bull.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Bumbo
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Rum cocktail showcasing White Rum, Cinnamon, Nutmeg—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Cinnamon Sticks.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of White Rum, 15ml of Simple Syrup, 30ml of Water, 1 pinch of Cinnamon, 1 pinch of Nutmeg, and 1 pinch of Allspice.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: Bushwacker
cocktails.description: A Delicious, creamy long cocktail that is very similar to the piña colada. The recipe here is for 3 cocktails. A Blender should be big enough to fit at least 1 liter of the mixture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the Rum, Coffee Liqueur, crème de cacao, Cream of coconut, Milk, and ice into a blender.
2. Blend on high until the mixture is smooth, frothy, and reaches a milkshake-like consistency (typically 10–25 seconds).
3. Optional but traditional: drizzle Chocolate Syrup in a swirl inside a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Pour the blended mixture into the glass.
5. Top with a sprinkle of freshly grated Nutmeg and maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger
cocktails.description: A Butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a blend of butterscotch and creamy liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Vodka Vanilla, 30ml of Butterscotch Liqueur, 30ml of Baileys, and 30ml of Kahlua.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger Shot
cocktails.description: A Butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a blend of butterscotch and creamy liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the glass: roll half of the rim of a shot glass in heated Chocolate Syrup, then roll the same half in crushed butterfinger candy.
2. Layer the kahlúa: pour 15ml of kahlúa into the shot glass.
3. Add Butterscotch Liqueur: layer 15ml of Butterscotch Liqueur on top of the kahlúa.
4. Layer Baileys: place a cocktail spoon(bowl side up) against the inside of the glass and slowly pour 15ml of Baileys over the back of the spoon to form a layer.
5. Add more crushed butterfinger candy.

cocktails.name: Buttery Nipple
cocktails.description: A Variation of the ."Slippery Nipple" cocktail but with butterscotch instead of Sambuca. This one is even sweeter and softer than the original.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of Butterscotch Liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Baileys on top.
3. Optionally, add a dash of Grenadine Syrup.

cocktails.name: Caipirão
cocktails.description: A Bright spirit sour balancing Lime, Sugar, Licor Beirão with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle Lime wedges and Sugar in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed ice.
3. Pour Licor Beirão over the ice.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: Brazil's national cocktail of muddled Lime, Sugar, and Cachaça served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle Lime wedges and Sugar in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed ice.
3. Pour Cachaça over the ice.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirissima
cocktails.description: A Bright Rum sour balancing Lime, Sugar, White Rum with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle Lime wedges and Sugar in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed ice.
3. Pour Rum over the ice.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipiroska
cocktails.description: A Bright Vodka sour balancing Vodka, Lime, Sugar with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle Lime wedges and Sugar in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed ice.
3. Pour Vodka over the ice.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: California Root Beer
cocktails.description: A Fizzy cocktail that mimics the taste of Root Beer with coffee and Vanilla notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake Vodka, Galliano, Coffee Liqueur, and Rich Simple Syrup with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass.
3. Top with Soda Water.
4. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Calypso Coffee
cocktails.description: A Rich coffee cocktail with Dark Rum and Kahlua finished with Cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Dark Rum, 30ml of Kahlua, 150ml of Espresso, and 30ml of Heavy Cream.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a coffee bean.

cocktails.name: Campari Gin Tonic
cocktails.description: A Simple classic cocktail, but with the bitterness of Campari and a hint of sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 40ml of Gin, 20ml of Campari, and 100ml of Tonic.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Canary Flip
cocktails.description: A bold combination of wine and Egg Liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Egg Liqueur, 60ml of Sauvignon Blanc, and 20ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Canchanchara
cocktails.description: A Rustic cuban mix of Honey, Lime, and White Rum served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Cuban Aguardiente, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 45ml of Honey Syrup.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Cantaritos
cocktails.description: A refreshing Mexican cocktail traditionally served in a clay pot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Tequila Blanco, 15ml of Orange Juice, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 60ml of Grapefruit Soda.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Grapefruit slice.

cocktails.name: Cape Cod
cocktails.description: A Simple mix of Vodka and Cranberry Juice named after the massachusetts peninsula.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 40ml of Vodka and120ml of Cranberry Juice.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Car Crash
cocktails.description: A sweet and fruity long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add Amaretto, Peach Liqueur, Southern Comfort(optional), Orange Juice, Lemon Juice, and Simple Syrup.
2. Shake well until chilled and strain into a tall collins glass filled with fresh ice.
3. Slowly pour 30ml of Grenadine over the back of a spoon so it sinks to the bottom, creating a red."crash" effect.
4. Garnish with a Blood Orange slice and a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Cardinale
cocktails.description: A Dry, bittersweet Negroni variation with Gin, Campari, and Dry Vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 40ml of Gin, 20ml of Dry Vermouth, and 10ml of Campari.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Caribbean Treasure
cocktails.description: A Tropical Liqueur cocktail with Lychee, Coconut Liqueur, Strawberry Liqueur, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with Strawberry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 peeled and pitted lychees into a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the Coconut Liqueur, Strawberry Liqueur, and Pineapple Juice into the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake vigorously until the mixture is well-chilled.
4. Double-strain into a highball glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with Strawberry halves and a fresh Mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Caribou Lou
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Rum cocktail showcasing Overproof Rum, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Overproof Rum, 30ml of Malibu Rum, 150ml of Pineapple Juice, and 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with Pineapple wedges and cherries.

cocktails.name: Caribbean Breeze
cocktails.description: A Tropical cocktail with light Rum, Banana Liqueur and Pineapple Juice, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 37.5ml of White Rum, 15ml of Banana Liqueur, 75ml of Pineapple Juice, 10ml of Cranberry Juice, 60ml of Grapefruit Juice, and 15ml of Lime Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of Grapefruit.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.description: A classic Gin sour with maraschino and Orange Bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 40ml of Old Tom Gin, 10ml of Luxardo Maraschino, 10ml of Lemon Juice, and 2 dashes of Orange Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Lemon and a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.description: A Celebratory sparkling cocktail with a Bitters-soaked Sugar cube and a splash of Cognac.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 1 cube of Sugar, 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters, 10ml of Cognac, 90ml of Champagne, and 3 drops of Grand Marnier to a champagne flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an Orange slice and a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Champs Elysees
cocktails.description: A Bright Brandy sour balancing Cognac, Green Chartreuse, Lemon with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with Lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Cognac, 15ml of Green Chartreuse, 20ml of Lemon Juice, 10ml of Rich Simple Syrup, and 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Lemon.

cocktails.name: Charlie Chaplin
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Brandy cocktail showcasing Apricot Brandy, Sloe Gin—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Apricot Brandy, 30ml of Sloe Gin, 30ml of Lime Juice, and 15ml of Water.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a peel of Lime.

cocktails.name: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktails.description: A Tropical swizzle of Green Chartreuse, Pineapple, Lime, and Falernum, finished with Mint and Nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 45ml of Green Chartreuse, 30ml of Pineapple Juice, 25.5ml of Lime Juice, and 15ml of Falernum to a tiki glass over ice.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with 3 Mint leaves and a pinch of Nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Cherry Alexander
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Vodka drink featuring Vodka Vanilla, cherry Heering, Creme de Cacao White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with Maraschino cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of Vodka Vanilla, 15ml of cherry Heering, 15ml of Creme de Cacao White, 30ml of Cream, and an of Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a pinch of Nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Chilcano de Pisco
cocktails.description: A Long, sparkling Brandy drink built for easy sipping, pairing Pisco, Angostura Bitters, Ginger Ale with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with Lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Pisco, 15ml of Lime Juice, 3 dashes of Angostura Bitters, and 100ml of Ginger Ale.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lime slice.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward Vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Coffee Liqueur, Espresso—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with Chocolate Syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dip the rim of a martini glass into Chocolate Syrup, then into Cocoa Powder or Chocolate shavings.
2. Swirl Chocolate Syrup around the inside of the glass and place it in the freezer for5-10 minutes.
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
4. Add 45ml of Vodka, 30ml of Coffee Liqueur, 45ml of Espresso, and 30ml of Creme de Cacao White.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into the chilled martini glass.
7. Garnish with 3 Coffee Beans.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Martini
cocktails.description: AN indulgent and velvety dessert cocktail that combines premium Vodka with the deep, rich notes of Chocolate for a luxurious treat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dip the rim of a martini glass into Chocolate Syrup, then into Cocoa Powder or Chocolate shavings.
2. Swirl Chocolate Syrup around the inside of the glass and place it in the freezer for5-10 minutes.
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
4. Add 45ml of Vodka and45ml of Creme de Cacao Brown.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
7. Garnish with a shaving of Chocolate.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Negroni
cocktails.description: A Rich twist on the classic Negroni, keeping its bittersweet aperitif profile while adding white cacao and Chocolate Bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 22.5ml of Punt e Mes, 22.5ml of Strucchi bitter, 7.5ml of Creme de Cacao White, and 3 dashes of Chocolate Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an Orange zest twist.

cocktails.name: Chocolate-Covered Cherry
cocktails.description: A Party favourite that uses the different weights of the liqueurs to create visible layers.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the Grenadine into the glass first.
2. Gently pour the Coffee Liqueur over the back of a bar spoon to keep it separate.
3. Finish by layering the Irish Cream on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktails.name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
cocktails.description: A Luxurious festive delight that pairs the velvety texture of Egg Liqueur with the botanical bite of Gin and the Dry elegance of Fino Sherry. Perfectly balanced, creamy, and topped with aromatic Nutmeg, it is the ultimate holiday dessert cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the Egg Liqueur, Gin, and Fino Sherry into a cocktail shaker filled with plenty of ice.
2. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until the mixture is well-chilled and develops a frothy consistency.
3. Double-strain the liquid into the chilled coupe glass to ensure a smooth texture.
4. Finish by grating fresh Nutmeg over the top for a festive aroma.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.description: A Pre-prohibition Gin sour colored with Raspberry Syrup and bound with Egg White.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of Gin, 15ml of Raspberry Syrup, 15ml of Lemon Juice, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Strawberry.

cocktails.name: Cold Blooded
cocktails.description: A sophisticated herbal twist on a fruit sour, blending the rich Orange notes of Grand Marnier with tart cranberry and fresh Lemon. Infused with aromatic Rosemary, this cocktail offers a crisp, vibrant, and perfectly balanced flavor profile that is both refreshing and complex.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the first Rosemary sprig and Lemon Juice into a cocktail shaker and muddle gently to release the aromatic oils.
2. Add the Grand Marnier, Cranberry Juice, and Rich Simple Syrup to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice to remove any Rosemary bits.
5. Garnish with the remaining fresh sprig of Rosemary and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Contessa
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward Gin drink built around Gin, Dry Vermouth, Aperol—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 30ml of Dry Vermouth, and 30ml of Aperol.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an Orange slice.

cocktails.name: Copenhagen 1939
cocktails.description: A Bright Gin sour balancing Gin, Red Vermouth, cherry Liqueur with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 30ml of Red Vermouth, 30ml of cherry Liqueur, 1 dash of Orange Bitters, 1 dash of Lemon, and 1 dash of Simple Syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

cocktails.name: Cornwall Negroni
cocktails.description: A Gin-forward variation of the classic Negroni, preserving its bittersweet Vermouth-and-bitter structure with an extra lift from Orange Bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Gin, 15ml of Punt e Mes, 15ml of Strucchi bitter, 15ml of Red Vermouth, and 1 dash of Orange Bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with an Orange zest twist.

cocktails.name: Corona Sunrise
cocktails.description: A Vibrant and refreshing Beer cocktail that puts a tropical twist on the classic Tequila sunrise. It perfectly blends the crispness of Corona with Tequila, sweet Orange Juice, and a splash of Grenadine for a beautiful layered look.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 330ml of Corona, 45ml of Tequila Blanco, 45ml of Orange Juice, and 15ml of Grenadine to a pub glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward Brandy drink built around Cognac, Calvados, Red Vermouth—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Cognac, 30ml of Calvados, and 30ml of Red Vermouth.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of Orange.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: A Balanced mix of Gin, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 1 dash of Absinthe, 30ml of Gin, 30ml of Cointreau, 30ml of Lillet Blanc, and 30ml of Lemon Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Lemon.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A Citrusy Vodka cocktail with cranberry and Orange notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 40ml of Vodka Citron, 15ml of Cointreau, 15ml of Lime Juice, and 30ml of Cranberry Juice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of Orange.

cocktails.name: Creamsicle
cocktails.description: A Luscious and velvety cocktail that perfectly captures the nostalgic flavor of an Orange creamsicle. It balances the bright, citrusy notes of Vodka and grand mariner with the rich, smooth texture of fresh Cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour Vodka, Grand Marnier, Cream, and Rich Simple Syrup(if desired) into a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a fresh Orange slice or zest.

cocktails.name: Creme Anglaise
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Vodka drink featuring Vodka, Egg Liqueur, Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with Chocolate.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Vodka, 60ml of Egg Liqueur, and 15ml of Cream.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick and nora glass.
5. Garnish with 2 pinches of Chocolate.

cocktails.name: Crimson King
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward Whiskey cocktail that balances the spicy bite of rye with the complex bitterness of strucchi and the herbal depth of Punt e Mes. Hints of cherry and coffee add a mysterious, dark richness to this bold drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Rye Whiskey, 22.5ml of Strucchi bitter, 15ml of Punt e Mes, 7.5ml of cherry Heering, and 5ml of Creme de Cafe.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: A Simple mix of Rum, Cola, and Lime for a refreshing long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 50ml of White Rum, 10ml of Lime Juice, and 120ml of Cola.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Culto A La Vida
cocktails.description: A Bright Rum sour balancing Dark Rum, Sugar, Lime with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with Lime Juice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Dark Rum, 1 teaspoon of Sugar, 120ml of Cranberry Juice, and 15ml of Lime Juice.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic Rum sour balancing Lime and Sugar.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 60ml of White Rum, 20ml of Lime Juice, and 20ml of Simple Syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a Lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Damn the Bloody Weather
cocktails.description: A Tropical Gin cocktail with Gin, Orange Curaçao, Red Vermouth, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with Blood Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of Gin, 15ml of Orange Curaçao, 30ml of Red Vermouth, 45ml of Blood Orange Juice, and 1 dash of Orange Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of Blood Orange.

cocktails.name: Dan Sabo's Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A Rich, creamy Whiskey drink featuring rye Whisky, Lemon, Egg White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with Maraschino cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of Rye Whiskey, 15ml of Lemon Juice, 15ml of Orange Juice, 15ml of Simple Syrup, and an Egg White into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the Egg.
3. Add ice and shake vigorously for about15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an ice cube.
5. Garnish with 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Dandy
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward Whiskey drink built around Whisky, Dubonnet, Cointreau—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with Orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 45ml of Whiskey, 45ml of Dubonnet, 15ml of Cointreau, and 1 dash of Angostura Bitters.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with an Orange twist.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.description: Spicy Ginger Beer topped with Dark Rum for a stormy refresher.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 60ml of Goslings Rum and100ml of Ginger Beer.
