ingredients.description: American Apple spirit often blended with neutral grain, usually 40–50% ABV. Brings baked-Apple flavor with subtle oak. Classic choice for jack roses and Old Fashioned riffs.

ingredients.name: Apricot Brandy
ingredients.description: Apricot-based Brandy or Liqueur with stone-fruit sweetness, usually 30–40% ABV. Adds jammy orchard notes to cocktails. Useful in sours and tiki drinks.

ingredients.name: Apricot Nectar
ingredients.description: Sweet, thick apricot Juice blend that brings mellow stone-fruit flavor. Great for tiki drinks, spritzes, and punches.

ingredients.name: Ardbeg
ingredients.description: Islay single malt scotch famed for intense peat smoke and maritime notes, typically around 46% ABV. Distilled on islay’s south coast. Bold choice for penicillin variations or neat sipping.

ingredients.name: Bacardi 151 Proof Rum
ingredients.description: Very high-proof Rum at 75½% ABV once made by bacardi. Powerful caramel and molasses notes suited to punches or flaming drinks. Handle carefully and dilute in cocktails.

ingredients.name: Baileys
ingredients.description: Baileys Irish Cream is a creamy Liqueur by Diageo, 17% ABV, with Chocolate and Whiskey notes. Serve in a mudslide or b-52.

ingredients.name: Banana
ingredients.description: Soft, sweet fruit with creamy texture used for smoothies and tiki garnishes. Works well in frozen cocktails or batched punches.

ingredients.name: Banana Liqueur
ingredients.description: Banana Liqueur is a sweet Banana spirit about 20–25% ABV. Mix it in a Banana Daiquiri or dirty Banana.

ingredients.name: Banana Liqueur Green
ingredients.description: Vivid green Banana Liqueur with sweet tropical aroma around 20–25% ABV. Adds color and ripe Banana notes to tiki drinks and dessert cocktails.

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.description: Basil is a fragrant herb with a sweet, slightly peppery flavor. It adds a fresh and aromatic note to both alcoholic and non-alcoholic cocktails. Common in summer drinks, it pairs especially well with Gin, Vodka, and citrus juices.

ingredients.name: Becherovka
ingredients.description: Becherovka is a traditional, 100% natural czech herbal Liqueur, made with a secret recipe of over 20 herbs and spices and an alcohol by volume (ABV) of 38%. It is often enjoyed as a digestif.

ingredients.name: Beef Bouillon
ingredients.description: Beef Bouillon is a savory broth made by simmering beef with vegetables and seasonings. IN cocktails, it is primarily used in savory drinks like the bloody bull, adding depth and umami richness. It can also enhance the complexity of creative culinary-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Beer
ingredients.description: Beer is a carbonated malt beverage around 4–6% ABV with malty, hoppy notes. Pour it in a michelada or shandy.

ingredients.name: Benedictine
ingredients.description: French herbal Liqueur around 40% ABV with honeyed sweetness and spice. Created by alexandre le grand from a secret blend of botanicals. Essential in drinks like the vieux carré and singapore sling.

ingredients.name: Berentzen Apfelkorn
ingredients.description: Berentzen Apfelkorn is a german Apple Schnapps by berentzen group, 18% ABV. Enjoy it in an Apple shot or hot apfel.

ingredients.name: Berries
ingredients.description: Mixed Berries that deliver bright acidity and deep color. Perfect for muddling into spritzes, Sangria, and berry sours.

ingredients.name: Bianco Vermouth
ingredients.description: Vermouth is an aromatized fortified wine around 15–18% ABV. Use it in a Martini or Negroni.

ingredients.name: Bittermens Boston Bittahs
ingredients.description: Citrus-forward Bitters with Grapefruit and hop notes. Brightens Gin, Rum, or Tequila cocktails with gentle bitterness. Use a dash or two to add sparkle without heavy spice.

ingredients.name: Bitters
ingredients.description: Aromatic Bitters are alcohol-based flavor concentrates infused with herbs and spices. Just a few dashes add bitterness, spice, and balance to cocktails. Keep them on the rail for old fashioneds, manhattans, and sours.

ingredients.name: Bizon Grass Vodka
ingredients.description: Polish Bison grass Vodka (Żubrówka) around 37½–40% ABV flavored with aromatic sweet grass. Offers Vanilla, almond, and herb notes. Great with Apple Juice or in refreshing highballs.

ingredients.name: Black Pepper
ingredients.description: Cracked peppercorn heat for savory cocktails or rimming a spicy bloody mary.

ingredients.name: Black Sambuca
ingredients.description: Dark Anise Liqueur with added licorice and spice, around 38% ABV. Richer and slightly bitter compared to white Sambuca. Served as shots, with coffee, or flaming in cocktails.

ingredients.name: Black Tea
ingredients.description: Black Tea is a strong, full-bodied tea with a rich, tannic flavor. It can be used as a base for tea cocktails or as an infused mixer with spirits. Its bold taste pairs well with Whiskey, Rum, and fruit liqueurs.

ingredients.name: Blackberry
ingredients.description: Juicy dark berry with sweet-tart flavor. Ideal for muddling into brambles or simmering into berry syrups.

ingredients.name: Blackberry Brandy
ingredients.description: Brandy or Liqueur flavored with blackberries, typically 30–40% ABV. Sweet, jammy berry notes with a warming finish. Works in sours, cobblers, and dessert drinks.

ingredients.name: Blackberry Liqueur
ingredients.description: Blackberry Liqueur offers rich berry sweetness at about 18–20% ABV. Use it in a bramble or Blackberry Martini.

ingredients.name: Blackcurrant Cordial
ingredients.description: Sweet blackcurrant Syrup with deep berry color and tangy sweetness. Dilute with soda or Water for a refreshing base. Great for spritzes, punches, or zero-proof cocktails.

ingredients.name: Blackstrap Rum
ingredients.description: The third boiling of the Sugar Syrup yields dark, viscous blackstrap molasses, known for its robust flavor. The majority of sucrose from the original Juice has crystallized and been removed. The caloric content of blackstrap molasses is mostly due to the small remaining Sugar content.

ingredients.name: Blood Orange
ingredients.description: Deep red-fleshed Orange with berry-like citrus flavor. Anthocyanin pigments give it a vivid hue that develops in cool nights. Great for adding color to sours and spritzes.

ingredients.name: Blue Curaçao
ingredients.description: Blue Curaçao is a blue-dyed Orange Liqueur, 20–25% ABV, with bitter citrus flavor. Star of the blue lagoon and blue hawaii.

ingredients.name: Blue Curaçao Syrup
ingredients.description: Blue Curaçao Syrup delivers sweet Orange flavor with a vivid blue hue. It mimics the taste of curaçao Liqueur without alcohol. Great for colorful tropical cocktails and lemonades.

ingredients.name: Blueberry Schnapps
ingredients.description: Blueberry Schnapps is a fruity schnapps around 15–25% ABV. Try it in a berry kamikaze or blueberry Martini.

ingredients.name: Boiling Water
ingredients.description: Freshly boiled Water used to dilute or build hot drinks. Essential for toddies, teas, and grogs. Use just off the boil to avoid scalding spirits or citrus.

ingredients.name: Borage
ingredients.description: Borage has a crisp, Cucumber-like flavor that brings refreshing aroma to spritzes and highballs. The star-shaped blue flowers make striking garnishes for Gin or Tequila drinks. Muddle gently or float the blossoms to keep their delicate look.

ingredients.name: Bourbon
ingredients.description: American Whiskey made primarily from corn and aged in new charred oak, usually 40–50% ABV. Offers caramel, Vanilla, and baking spice notes. Staple for old fashioneds, manhattans, and many classics.

ingredients.name: Brandy
ingredients.description: Distilled wine spirit aged in oak, commonly 36–60% ABV. Smooth notes of dried fruit, Vanilla, and oak. Versatile for sipping neat or mixing in sidecars and punch.

ingredients.name: Brown Sugar
ingredients.description: Brown Sugar is fine, moist cane Sugar with molasses added back for color and flavor. It dissolves quickly and brings caramel notes to syrups and hot drinks. Light and dark varieties offer different molasses intensity.

ingredients.name: Butter
ingredients.description: Butter is churned dairy fat that adds richness and a silky mouthfeel. A Small knob can soften boozy edges or balance spices in warm cocktails.

ingredients.name: Butterfinger candy bar
ingredients.description: Butterfinger is a candy bar manufactured by the ferrara candy company, a subsidiary of ferrero. The bar consists of a layered crispy peanut Butter core covered in Chocolate.

ingredients.name: Butterscotch Liqueur
ingredients.description: Butterscotch Liqueur is a sweet caramel spirit about 15% ABV. Works in a butterball or caramel appletini.

ingredients.name: Butterscotch Schnapps
ingredients.description: Butterscotch Schnapps is a toffee-flavored schnapps around 15–20% ABV. Ideal for a buttery nipple or oatmeal cookie shot.

ingredients.name: Cachaça
ingredients.description: Cachaça (portuguese pronunciation: [kaˈʃasɐ]) is a distilled spirit made from fermented sugarcane Juice. Also known as aguardente, pinga, caninha and other names, it is the most popular distilled alcoholic beverage in brazil. Outside brazil, Cachaça is used almost exclusively as an ingredient in tropical drinks, with the caipirinha being the most famous cocktail.

ingredients.name: Calvados
ingredients.description: Calvados is an Apple Brandy from the normandy region of france, with an ABV typically between 40% and 45%. It has a complex flavor profile combining baked Apple, spice, and oak notes. Calvados is often enjoyed neat or used in cocktails that highlight its rich fruit character.

ingredients.name: Campari
ingredients.description: Campari is a bitter Orange aperitif by Campari group, roughly 20–28% ABV. Essential in a Negroni or americano.

ingredients.name: Caramel Syrup
ingredients.description: Caramel Syrup is a sweet, rich liquid made by caramelizing Sugar and mixing it with Water. It adds a toasty, buttery sweetness to cocktails, coffee drinks, and desserts. Perfect for enhancing creamy and dessert-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Cardamom
ingredients.description: Fragrant Cardamom pods bring citrusy, eucalyptus spice to syrups and infusions.

ingredients.name: Celery
ingredients.description: Celery provides a fresh, crisp, and slightly peppery flavor to cocktails. It is commonly used as a garnish for bloody marys and other savory drinks. Celery Juice or muddled stalks can also add a refreshing vegetal note.

ingredients.name: Celery Salt
ingredients.description: Seasoned Salt with Celery seed that adds savory lift to bloody marys and micheladas.

ingredients.name: Chambord
ingredients.description: Chambord is a black Raspberry Liqueur from france by brown‑forman, 16.5% ABV. Great in a French Martini or kir royale.

ingredients.name: Chamomile Cordial
ingredients.description: Chamomile Cordial is a sweet, floral Syrup made from Chamomile flowers. It has a soothing aroma and mild Honey-like taste, making it a calming addition to cocktails. Pairs well with Gin, Vodka, and citrus juices.

ingredients.name: Chamomile flowers
ingredients.description: Chamomile flowers come from daisy-like plants and are primarily used for making calming herbal teas, in cooking, and in cosmetics due to their Apple-like aroma.

ingredients.name: Champagne
ingredients.description: Champagne is a French Sparkling Wine around 12% ABV with crisp bubbles. Pour it in a mimosa or french75.

ingredients.name: Cherry
ingredients.description: Sweet or tart red stone fruit often used as a garnish or muddled ingredient. Adds a pop of color and gentle sweetness.

ingredients.name: Cherry Brandy
ingredients.description: Cherry-based Brandy or Liqueur with deep red fruit character, around 30–40% ABV. Can be Dry Kirsch-style or sweetened. Adds cherry richness to classics like the singapore sling.

ingredients.name: Cherry Heering
ingredients.description: Cherry Heering is a danish cherry Liqueur by heering, 24% ABV. Use it in a singapore sling or blood & sand.

ingredients.name: Cherry Juice
ingredients.description: Tart, ruby-colored Juice with rich cherry flavor. Ideal for sours, spritzes, or topping soda cocktails. Balances Whiskey and Rum drinks.

ingredients.name: Cherry Liqueur
ingredients.description: Cherry Liqueur is a sweet-tart cherry spirit about 20% ABV. Mix it in a singapore sling or cherry smash.

ingredients.name: Chestnut Liqueur
ingredients.description: Chestnut Liqueur is nutty and sweet with 15–20% ABV. Try it in a mont Blanc or autumn cocktail.

ingredients.name: Chili Pepper
ingredients.description: Fresh chilli pepper adds bright heat to cocktails.

ingredients.name: Chili Powder
ingredients.description: Chili Powder provides a warm, smoky heat that enhances savory and adventurous cocktails. It is often used as a glass rim seasoning or mixed into syrups. Works well in Tequila and Mezcal-based drinks.

ingredients.name: Chocolate
ingredients.description: Rich cocoa-based ingredient used for desserts and cocktails. Shavings or chunks add aroma and slight bitterness. Perfect for garnishing creamy or coffee drinks.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Bitters
ingredients.description: Chocolate Bitters are aromatic Bitters with cocoa and spice flavors, typically around 40–45% ABV. They add depth to Whiskey, Rum, and Tequila cocktails. A Small dash can transform a dessert cocktail or Old Fashioned.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Liqueur
ingredients.description: Chocolate Liqueur is a cocoa-flavored spirit roughly 15–20% ABV. Serve it in a Chocolate Martini or mudslide.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Syrup
ingredients.description: Chocolate Syrup is a rich cocoa sweetener used for dessert drinks. It adds Chocolate aroma and body to milkshakes or creamy cocktails. Drizzle inside glasses for garnish.

ingredients.name: Cinnamon
ingredients.description: Sweet warming spice that blends into syrups and dustings for tiki and winter drinks.

ingredients.name: Cinnamon Sticks
ingredients.description: Cinnamon Sticks provide a warm, sweet spice when infused or used as a garnish. They release flavor gradually, making them ideal for hot cocktails. They also serve as decorative stirrers in seasonal drinks.

ingredients.name: Cinnamon Syrup
ingredients.description: Cinnamon Syrup combines Sugar with warming Cinnamon spice. It brings cozy baking notes to tiki drinks, punches, or coffee cocktails. Keep refrigerated for best flavor.

ingredients.name: Cloves
ingredients.description: Potent warming buds used sparingly in syrups, mulled mixes, and garnishes.

ingredients.name: Coca-Cola
ingredients.description: Coca-Cola is a caramelized Cola soda created in the late 19th Century. Its blend of caffeine, sweetness, and spice makes it a versatile mixer with Rum or Whiskey. Bottlers worldwide sell it in cans, bottles, and fountain formats.

ingredients.name: Cocoa Powder
ingredients.description: Unsweetened Cocoa Powder delivers intense Chocolate flavor. Dust over drinks or mix into syrups for a bittersweet note. Bloom in warm liquid to avoid clumping.

ingredients.name: Coconut Cream
ingredients.description: Coconut Cream is a thick, rich product made from coconut flesh. It lends a smooth texture and tropical sweetness to cocktails like the piña colada. Perfect for creamy, dessert-like tropical drinks.

ingredients.name: Coconut Flakes
ingredients.description: Dried coconut shreds with sweet, tropical aroma. Toast them for deeper flavor before using as a garnish. Can be infused into syrups or Milk for tiki-style drinks.

ingredients.name: Coconut Liqueur
ingredients.description: Coconut Liqueur is a tropical sweet spirit around 15–21% ABV. Blend it into a piña colada or chi chi.

ingredients.name: Coconut Milk
ingredients.description: Coconut Milk is pressed from coconut flesh, giving a creamy texture with mild sweetness. It adds body and tropical flavor to blended drinks and punches.

ingredients.name: Coconut Rum
ingredients.description: Coconut Rum infuses Rum with coconut at about 21% ABV. Best in a piña colada or painkiller.

ingredients.name: Coconut Syrup
ingredients.description: Coconut Syrup delivers sweet, creamy coconut flavor in a pourable form. Use it to mimic Coconut Cream without the heaviness. Perfect for coladas, spritzers, or coffee drinks.

ingredients.name: Coconut Water
ingredients.description: Light, naturally sweet Water from young coconuts. Adds subtle coconut flavor and electrolytes to low-ABV or nonalcoholic drinks. Refreshing mixer with Rum, Tequila, or tropical fruit.

ingredients.name: Coffee Beans
ingredients.description: Coffee Beans are used to infuse spirits or garnish coffee-flavored cocktails. They release aroma without adding sweetness. A Single bean is often floated on drinks for decoration.

ingredients.name: Coffee Brandy
ingredients.description: Coffee Brandy combines roasted coffee and Brandy, roughly 20–30% ABV. Enjoy in a Brandy alexander or Espresso Martini.

ingredients.name: Coffee Liqueur
ingredients.description: Coffee Liqueur is a sweet coffee spirit at 20–30% ABV. Perfect for a white lebowski or Espresso Martini.

ingredients.name: Cognac
ingredients.description: French grape Brandy from the Cognac region, double-distilled and aged in oak at 40% ABV. Shows dried fruit, Vanilla, and floral notes. Premium choice for sipping or cocktails like the Sidecar.

ingredients.name: Cointreau
ingredients.description: Cointreau is an Orange-flavoured Triple Sec Liqueur produced in saint-barthélemy-d'anjou, france. It is consumed as an apéritif and digestif, and is a component of several well-known cocktails. It was originally called curaçao blanco Triple Sec.

ingredients.name: Cola
ingredients.description: Cola is a sweet, carbonated beverage with caramel, Vanilla, and spice notes. It pairs well with Rum, Whiskey, and other dark spirits. Adds sweetness, color, and effervescence to cocktails.

ingredients.name: Condensed Milk
ingredients.description: Condensed Milk is cow's Milk reduced with Sugar into a thick, shelf-stable Syrup. It sweetens and enriches coffee cocktails, dessert drinks, and vietnamese-inspired mixes.

ingredients.name: Coriander
ingredients.description: Citrusy Coriander seeds used to add bright spice to Gin-inspired syrups and Bitters.

ingredients.name: Corn Syrup
ingredients.description: Corn Syrup is a neutral, viscous sweetener made from corn starch. It keeps sauces smooth and prevents crystallization in syrups. Bartenders sometimes use it for stable homemade sodas or garnishes.

ingredients.name: Corona
ingredients.description: Corona is a pale Lager from mexico brewed by grupo modelo, 4.5% ABV. Serve it in a michelada or Corona sunrise.

ingredients.name: Cranberry Juice
ingredients.description: Cranberry Juice is a tart, ruby drink often sweetened for cocktails. It adds acidity and color to drinks like the cosmopolitan and cape codder. Typically acidic with a ph around 2.3–2.5.

ingredients.name: Cream
ingredients.description: Cream is the high-fat layer skimmed from Milk. It lends body and mellow sweetness to shaken drinks, flips, and dessert cocktails.

ingredients.name: Creme de Banane
ingredients.description: CRème de banane is a Banana Liqueur about 20% ABV. Use it in a Banana Daiquiri or yellow bird.

ingredients.name: Creme de Cacao Brown
ingredients.description: Dark crème de cacao is a Chocolate Liqueur around 20–25% ABV. Mix it in a Brandy alexander or grasshopper.

ingredients.name: Creme de Cacao White
ingredients.description: White crème de cacao is a clear cocoa Liqueur around 20–25% ABV. Ideal in a grasshopper or alexander.

ingredients.name: Creme de Cafe
ingredients.description: Coffee-flavored Liqueur with a smooth, sweet roast profile. Use it for white lebowski, Espresso cocktails, or dessert drinks.

ingredients.name: Creme de Cassis
ingredients.description: CRème de cassis is a blackcurrant Liqueur from france, 15–20% ABV. Key for a kir or el diablo.

ingredients.name: Creme de Menthe Green
ingredients.description: Green crème de menthe is a Mint Liqueur about 25% ABV. Use it in a grasshopper or stinger.

ingredients.name: Creme de Menthe White
ingredients.description: White crème de menthe is a clear Mint Liqueur about 25% ABV. Try it in a stinger or grasshopper.

ingredients.name: Creme de Mure
ingredients.description: CRème de mûre is a Blackberry Liqueur around 20% ABV. Ideal for a bramble or mûre royale.

ingredients.name: Creme de Violette
ingredients.description: CRème de violette is a floral violet Liqueur at 16–20% ABV. Classic in an aviation or blue moon.

ingredients.name: Creole Bitters
ingredients.description: Spice-driven Bitters with baking spice, Anise, and pepper notes. Great for Rum and rye cocktails needing warmth and depth. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering citrus.

ingredients.name: Crown Royal
ingredients.description: Crown Royal, originally known as Seagram's Crown Royal, is a blended canadian Whisky brand created by Seagram and owned by Diageo since 2000. Production of Crown Royal is done at Gimli, Manitoba, while the blending and bottling of the Whisky are done in a facility in Amherstburg, Ontario.

ingredients.name: Cuban Aguardiente
ingredients.description: Cuban sugarcane spirit around 30–40% ABV with grassy, lightly sweet profile. Distilled from fermented molasses or Juice. Used in traditional cuban cocktails and celebratory shots.

ingredients.name: Cuban Rum
ingredients.description: Cuban Rum is defined by a specific ."Spanish-style" production method that results in a profile typically lighter, drier, and crisper than its Caribbean neighbours.

ingredients.name: Cucumber
ingredients.description: Cool, crisp fruit with refreshing vegetal notes. Excellent for muddling into Gin cocktails and light spritzes.

ingredients.name: Cynar
ingredients.description: Cynar is an artichoke-based Italian Amaro by Campari group, 16.5% ABV. Mix it in a Cynar spritz or bitter giuseppe.

ingredients.name: Daiquiri Bitters
ingredients.description: Bitters designed to complement Rum and Lime drinks. Adds bright spice and subtle tropical bitterness without masking acidity. A Dash sharpens daiquiris or other light Rum cocktails.

ingredients.name: Dark Rum
ingredients.description: Dark Rum aged longer or with added molasses for deep caramel color, typically 40–50% ABV. Flavors of Brown Sugar, spice, and Vanilla. Great in tiki drinks and punches.

ingredients.name: Demerara Rum
ingredients.description: Rum made from Demerara Sugar, often from guyana, around 40–50% ABV. Rich molasses, smoke, and toffee notes. Adds depth to tiki cocktails and stirred Rum drinks.

ingredients.name: Demerara Sugar
ingredients.description: Demerara Sugar has large, crunchy crystals with natural molasses. It brings toffee-like sweetness and texture to syrups and muddled drinks. Less processed than standard Brown Sugar, so flavors stay mellow.

ingredients.name: Demerara Sugar Syrup
ingredients.description: 2 Parts Demerara Sugar to 1 part Water.

ingredients.name: Disaronno Velvet
ingredients.description:
Disaronno Velvet is a smooth, all-white Cream Liqueur that blends the classic almond flavour of the original disaronno with creamy, velvety notes of Chocolate and Vanilla.
disaronno velvet has an alcohol by volume (ABV) of 17% and is designed to be enjoyed primarily over ice.

ingredients.name: Don's Mix
ingredients.description: 2 Parts of fresh yellow Grapefruit and 1 part of Cinnamon Syrup.

ingredients.name: Drambuie
ingredients.description: Scottish Liqueur blending Scotch Whisky with heather Honey, herbs, and spices at about 40% ABV. Smooth, sweet, and spiced. Signature ingredient in the rusty nail.

ingredients.name: Dried Apricot
ingredients.description: Chewy, concentrated apricot with honeyed sweetness. Great for infusions, garnishes, or simmering into Syrup.

ingredients.name: Dry Vermouth
ingredients.description: Dry Vermouth is an herbal fortified wine around 15–18% ABV. Essential for a Martini or gibson.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet
ingredients.description: Dubonnet is a sweet aperitif by Pernod Ricard, about 14.8% ABV, with spiced wine notes. Serve in a Dubonnet cocktail.

ingredients.name: Earl Grey Tea
ingredients.description: Black Tea scented with bergamot citrus. Steeped leaves make aromatic syrups or tea bases for spritzes and toddies. Slight bitterness pairs well with Gin or Whisky.

ingredients.name: Egg
ingredients.description: Whole Egg adds richness and foam to flips and nogs. Shake hard to fully emulsify. Use fresh eggs and follow safe-handling guidelines.

ingredients.name: Egg Liqueur
ingredients.description: Egg Liqueur is a creamy Egg-based spirit at 14–20% ABV. Sip it in a snowball or Dutch coffee.

ingredients.name: Egg White
ingredients.description: Egg White creates silky texture and a stable foam in sours and fizzes. Dry shake first to build structure, then add ice to chill. Always use fresh eggs or pasteurized cartons.

ingredients.name: Egg Yolk
ingredients.description: Egg Yolk delivers custardy body to flips and eggnog-style drinks. Combine with Sugar and spice for dessert-like cocktails. Use immediately and keep chilled for safety.

ingredients.name: Elderflower Cordial
ingredients.description: Elderflower Cordial is a soft drink made largely from a refined Sugar and Water solution and uses the flowers of the european elderberry. Historically the cordial has been popular in north western europe where it has a strong victorian heritage.

ingredients.name: Espresso
ingredients.description: Concentrated coffee shot with rich crema and intense bitterness. Adds depth to coffee cocktails like an Espresso Martini. Use freshly pulled Espresso for the best foam and aroma.

ingredients.name: Everclear
ingredients.description: Neutral grain spirit sold at very high proofs up to 95% ABV. Odorless and colorless, used for infusions and punches. Must be heavily diluted before drinking.

ingredients.name: Falernum
ingredients.description: Falernum is a caribbean Syrup flavored with almond, Ginger, Lime, and baking spices. It can be alcoholic or not but is always thick and lightly spiced. Use it to bring tropical warmth to tiki recipes.

ingredients.name: Fernet Branca
ingredients.description: Fernet is a type of Italian Amaro with an ABV of 39–45%. It is intensely bitter and herbal, with notes of Mint, myrrh, and saffron. Often taken as a shot or used sparingly in cocktails for depth.

ingredients.name: Fig
ingredients.description: Fig adds a rich, gently sweet flavor with notes of Honey, dried fruit, and a hint of earthiness. IN cocktails, it brings warmth and depth, pairing beautifully with Whiskey, Rum, Brandy, and herbal liqueurs. Perfect for autumnal, dessert, or slow-sipping drinks.

ingredients.name: Fino Sherry
ingredients.description: Pale, bone-Dry sherry aged under flor with delicate almond and saline notes. Sip chilled or mix into light, nutty cocktails.

ingredients.name: Frangelico
ingredients.description: Frangelico is an Italian Hazelnut Liqueur by gruppo Campari, 20% ABV. Works in a nutty Martini or Chocolate cake shot.

ingredients.name: Fresca
ingredients.description: Fresca is a Grapefruit-flavored diet soda with a crisp, Dry finish. Zero Sugar keeps cocktails lighter while adding bubbles. Mix with Tequila, Gin, or Vodka for bright spritzes.

ingredients.name: Galliano
ingredients.description: Italian Vanilla-Anise herbal Liqueur around 30% ABV. Tall golden bottle with flavors of Vanilla, citrus, and spice. Key for harvey wallbangers and modern coffee drinks.

ingredients.name: Gin
ingredients.description: Juniper-forward distilled spirit flavored with botanicals, typically 40–47% ABV. Offers piney, citrus, and spice notes depending on style. Foundation for martinis, Gin and tonics, and many classics.

ingredients.name: Ginger
ingredients.description: Spicy, aromatic root used fresh or ground for syrups, mules, and punches.

ingredients.name: Ginger Ale
ingredients.description: Ginger Ale is a carbonated soft drink flavoured with Ginger in one of two ways. The golden style is credited to the american doctor thomas cantrell. The Dry style (also called the pale style) is a paler drink with a much milder Ginger flavour, and was created by canadian john mclaughlin.

ingredients.name: Ginger Beer
ingredients.description: Ginger Beer is a sweetened and carbonated, usually non-alcoholic beverage, a type of soft drink. Historically it was a type of Beer brewed by the natural fermentation of prepared Ginger spice, yeast and Sugar.

ingredients.name: Ginger Candy
ingredients.description: Sweet, spicy candied Ginger pieces. Chop for garnish or muddle to add heat and aroma. Syrup from the jar can sweeten highballs or teas.

ingredients.name: Ginger Syrup
ingredients.description: Ginger Syrup packs spicy, fresh Ginger heat balanced with sweetness. It mixes easily into highballs, sours, and zero-proof drinks. Adds a zesty kick without muddling fresh Ginger.

ingredients.name: Godiva Liqueur
ingredients.description: Godiva Liqueur is a belgian Chocolate spirit about 15% ABV. Enjoy it in a Chocolate Martini or mocha mudslide.

ingredients.name: Gold Jamaican Rum
ingredients.description: The primary difference for Gold Jamaican Rum lies in its aging process, which gives it a richer, more complex flavor profile than White Rum, while being less bold and aged than Dark Rum. Jamaican rums in general are known for their distinct ."funky" character due to a unique high-ester fermentation process.

ingredients.name: Gold Puerto Rican Rum
ingredients.description: Lightly aged Gold Rum from puerto rico, around 40% ABV. Soft Vanilla and caramel notes with a smooth finish. Reliable mixing Rum for tropical cocktails.

ingredients.name: Gold Rum
ingredients.description:
Gold Rum and Spiced Rum are distinct types of Rum, differing primarily in their production and flavour profiles.

gold Rum features a smooth, rich flavour with notes of caramel, Vanilla, and spice, often with hints of oak.
aged in oak barrels, with the ageing process contributing to both colour and flavour.

ingredients.name: Goldschläger
ingredients.description: Swiss Cinnamon schnapps around 43½% ABV with floating gold flakes. Sweet, spicy, and eye-catching. Often enjoyed chilled or in party shots.

ingredients.name: Gomme Syrup
ingredients.description: Gomme Syrup is a drink sweetener commonly used instead of Simple Syrup in many classic cocktail recipes. While some people may refer to Simple Syrup as gum Syrup, true gum Syrup contains an emulsifier known as gum arabic, a natural gum made from the sap of two types of acacia tree.

ingredients.name: Goslings Rum
ingredients.description: Bermudian Rum best known for black seal, about 40–48% ABV. Dark, rich molasses character with a hint of spice. Classic choice for a dark 'n stormy or tiki drinks.

ingredients.name: Gran Classico
ingredients.description: Gran Classico is a swiss bitter aperitivo by tempus fugit, 28% ABV. Try it in a Negroni or spritz.

ingredients.name: Grand Marnier
ingredients.description: Grand Marnier (French pronunciation: ​[ɡʁɑ̃ maʁnje]) cordon rouge is an Orange-flavoured Liqueur created in 1880 by alexandre marnier-lapostolle. It is made from a blend of Cognac Brandy, distilled essence of bitter Orange, and Sugar. Grand Marnier cordon rouge is 40% alcohol (70 proof in the uk, 80 proof in the us).

ingredients.name: Grape Juice
ingredients.description: Sweet purple Grape Juice with jammy notes. Useful for spritzes, Sangria bases, or nonalcoholic mixes. Pairs with Vodka, Gin, or Sparkling Wine.

ingredients.name: Grapefruit
ingredients.description: Grapefruit adds a tangy, slightly bitter citrus flavor to cocktails. It can be juiced, sliced, or used as a garnish. Works well in palomas, greyhounds, and Gin drinks.

ingredients.name: Grapefruit Juice
ingredients.description: Bitter-sweet citrus Juice with bright aroma. Great for palomas, greyhounds, and other highballs. Adds refreshing bitterness to balance sweet liqueurs.

ingredients.name: Grapefruit Soda
ingredients.description: Pink Grapefruit Soda is a sweet-tart, sparkling citrus drink. It pairs beautifully with Tequila in a paloma. Adds both flavor and fizz.

ingredients.name: Grapes
ingredients.description: Juicy Berries ranging from sweet to tart depending on the variety. Use for muddling, juicing, or fresh garnishes.

ingredients.name: Grappa
ingredients.description: Grappa is an Italian pomace Brandy with an ABV of 35–60%. It has a strong, Dry, and sometimes floral profile. Traditionally sipped neat after meals.

ingredients.name: Green Chartreuse
ingredients.description: Herbal Liqueur made by carthusian monks with 130 botanicals, bottled at 55% ABV. Vivid green color with intense herbal, Honey, and spice notes. Key ingredient in the Last Word and many modern cocktails.

ingredients.name: Grenadine
ingredients.description: Grenadine is a deep-red, nonalcoholic Syrup with tart-sweet pomegranate flavor. It colors cocktails pink or crimson while adding fruity brightness. Quality versions lean on real pomegranate instead of artificial cherry.

ingredients.name: Guinness
ingredients.description: Guinness is an Irish stout brewed by Diageo, 4.2% ABV, with creamy roasted notes. Pour it in a black velvet or Irish car bomb.

ingredients.name: Half-and-half
ingredients.description: Half and half is an equal-parts blend of Milk and Cream typically used in coffee. It carries about 12.5% butterfat with a light, silky texture. Use it when you want more richness than Milk without the weight of Heavy Cream.

ingredients.name: Hazelnut Liqueur
ingredients.description: Hazelnut Liqueur is sweet and nutty, around 20% ABV. Use it in a nutty lebowski or chocolatini.

ingredients.name: Heavy Cream
ingredients.description: Heavy Cream is a high-butterfat dairy product separated from Milk. Its richness softens strong spirits and adds velvety texture to flips or dessert cocktails. It can also be whipped for topping boozy drinks.

ingredients.name: Hennessy XO
ingredients.description: Hennessy is a world-famous Cognac brand with an ABV of 40%. It offers rich notes of fruit, Vanilla, and oak from barrel aging. Enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in classic cocktails.

ingredients.name: Honey
ingredients.description: Natural sweetener with floral notes that vary by bloom. Thicken it into a 1:1 Honey Syrup for easier mixing. Balances citrus and Whiskey cocktails beautifully.

ingredients.name: Honey Syrup
ingredients.description: Usually, in cocktails, a Honey Syrup is used with 3 parts of Honey and 1 part of Water.

ingredients.name: Honeydew Melon
ingredients.description: The Honeydew Melon is a sweet, juicy, and refreshing fruit, known for its pale green flesh and smooth, creamy-yellow rind when ripe.

ingredients.name: Hot Chocolate (Cacao)
ingredients.description: Hot Chocolate (cacao) is a sweetened cocoa beverage blended with Milk or Cream. It brings Chocolate flavor and warmth to winter cocktails. Spike it with liqueurs or spirits for cozy serves.

ingredients.name: Hot Sauce
ingredients.description: Vinegar-forward chili sauce that brings heat to micheladas, bloody marys, and spicy rims.

ingredients.name: Hpnotiq
ingredients.description: Hpnotiq is a blue tropical Liqueur by heaven hill, 17% ABV, with Passion Fruit and citrus. Mix it in an incredible hulk or Hpnotiq breeze.

ingredients.name: Ice
ingredients.description: Frozen Water that chills and dilutes cocktails. Use large cubes for slower melt or crushed ice for tiki drinks. Clear, fresh ice keeps flavors clean.

ingredients.name: Ice Cream
ingredients.description: Ice Cream adds richness, sweetness, and creaminess to cocktails. It blends with spirits to create indulgent dessert drinks. Popular in spiked milkshakes and floats.

ingredients.name: Irish Cream
ingredients.description: Irish Cream is a creamy Whiskey Liqueur around 15–20% ABV. Great in an Irish coffee or mudslide.

ingredients.name: Irish Whiskey
ingredients.description: Irish Whiskey is typically triple-distilled and aged at least three years, giving a smooth, light profile around 40% ABV. Shows malt sweetness with gentle fruit. Great for Irish coffee or easy sipping.

ingredients.name: Islay Scotch Whisky
ingredients.description: Scotch Whisky from the island of islay known for peat smoke, sea spray, and iodine notes. Generally 40–46% ABV with a bold, coastal character. Sipped neat or used to add smoke to cocktails.

ingredients.name: Jack Daniels
ingredients.description: Jack daniel's is a famous brand of tennessee Whiskey known for its smooth, charcoal-mellowed character. Produced in lynchburg, tennessee, it is a versatile spirit enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or as a base for many popular cocktails like the jack and coke.

ingredients.name: Jägermeister
ingredients.description: JäGermeister is a german herbal Liqueur by mast-Jägermeister, 35% ABV. Enjoy it in a jägerbomb or surfer on acid.

ingredients.name: Jamaican Dark Rum
ingredients.description: Pot-still heavy Jamaican Rum with deep molasses and estery funk, usually around 40–50% ABV. Dark color from aging and caramel. Adds bass notes to tiki drinks and punches.

ingredients.name: Jamaican Rum
ingredients.description: Robust Jamaican Rum often pot-distilled, around 40–50% ABV. Expect ripe Banana, molasses, and tropical spice aromas. Great in mai tais and Rum punches.

ingredients.name: Japanese Whisky
ingredients.description: Whisky distilled in japan using techniques inspired by scotch, typically around 43% ABV. Balanced malt and grain blends with refined oak influence. Elegant choice for highballs and sipping.

ingredients.name: Jim Beam
ingredients.description: Kentucky straight Bourbon around 40% ABV from the beam family distillery. Offers sweet corn, Vanilla, and oak notes. Versatile for mixing or casual sipping.

ingredients.name: Johnnie Walker
ingredients.description: Global blended Scotch Whisky brand commonly bottled at 40% ABV. Layered malt and grain flavors with gentle smoke depending on the label. Popular in highballs and spirit-forward cocktails.

ingredients.name: Kahlua
ingredients.description: Kahlúa is a Mexican Coffee Liqueur by Pernod Ricard, 20% ABV. Perfect in a white lebowski or Espresso Martini.

ingredients.name: Kina Lillet
ingredients.description: Kina Lillet was the original bitter, quinine-infused French aperitif (1887-1986) famously used in james bond's vesper Martini in casino royale, but it was reformulated without quinine in 1986, becoming the sweeter, less bitter Lillet Blanc we know today, with cocchi americano or kina l'avion often suggested as substitutes for the authentic bitter taste.

ingredients.name: Kirsch
ingredients.description: Kirsch, or kirschwasser, is a clear cherry Brandy with 37–43% ABV. It is Dry and aromatic, made from distilled cherries. Used in cocktails, desserts, and fondue recipes.

ingredients.name: Kiwi fruit
ingredients.description: Bright green fruit with sweet-tart flavor and tiny seeds. Adds tropical freshness when muddled or pureed.

ingredients.name: Kiwi fruit Liqueur
ingredients.description: Kiwi fruit Liqueur is a tangy green Liqueur around 15–20% ABV. Shake it into a Kiwi fruit Martini or tropical Daiquiri.

ingredients.name: Kümmel liqueur
ingredients.description: Kummel is a sweet, aromatic Liqueur flavoured primarily with caraway seeds, cumin, and fennel, often with hints of Anise and citrus. It is traditionally served ice-cold as a digestif after meals. Kummel Liqueur typically has an alcohol by volume (ABV) ranging from 35% to 40%.

ingredients.name: Lagavulin 16 years
ingredients.description: Islay single malt aged 16 years around 43% ABV. Delivers peat smoke, dried fruit, and maritime richness. Best sipped neat or in bold Whisky cocktails.

ingredients.name: Lager
ingredients.description: Lager is a crisp bottom-fermented Beer around 4–5% ABV. Use it in a shandy or michelada.

ingredients.name: Laphroaig
ingredients.description: Iconic islay single malt known for medicinal peat smoke and seaweed notes, about 40–48% ABV. Oak aging adds Vanilla sweetness beneath the smoke. Divisive but distinctive in cocktails or neat.

ingredients.name: Lemon
ingredients.description: Bright, acidic citrus used for Juice, zest, and garnish. High in citric acid, it sharpens sours and punches. Essential for classics from the Lemon drop to the Whiskey sour.

ingredients.name: Lemon Bitters
ingredients.description: Citrus Bitters focused on bright Lemon peel and spice. Ideal for lifting Gin, Vodka, or Whiskey drinks with zesty bitterness. A Couple dashes freshen spritzes or collins variations.

ingredients.name: Lemon Juice
ingredients.description: Fresh Lemon Juice with sharp acidity. Essential for sours and lemonades. Brightens spirits from Gin to Whiskey.

ingredients.name: Lemon Tonic
ingredients.description: Lemon Tonic Water combines quinine bitterness with bright Lemon. Adds citrus zip and carbonation to Gin or Vodka drinks. Use when you want more zest than standard Tonic.

ingredients.name: Lemon-Lime Soda
ingredients.description: Classic Lemon-Lime Soda with gentle citrus sweetness and plenty of fizz. Balances tart spirits or liqueurs while keeping drinks light. Ideal for highballs and party punches.

ingredients.name: Lemonade
ingredients.description: Lemonade is a sweetened Lemon beverage served either still or carbonated. Cloudy styles mix Lemon Juice, Water, and Sugar, while clear versions resemble fizzy Lemon soda. Variations include Pink Lemonade or hard Lemonade for boozy spins.

ingredients.name: Licor Beirão
ingredients.description: Portuguese herbal Liqueur around 22% ABV made with a secret mix of spices. Sweet, aromatic, and lightly minty. Enjoyed chilled or in the caipirão cocktail.

ingredients.name: Lillet Blanc
ingredients.description: Lillet Blanc is a French aperitif wine by Pernod Ricard, 17% ABV, with citrus and floral notes. Key in a vesper or corpse reviver no. 2.

ingredients.name: Lime
ingredients.description: Zesty green citrus with sharp, aromatic Juice. Common in mojitos, Margaritas, and highballs. Provides acidity and freshness when muddled or juiced.

ingredients.name: Lime Juice
ingredients.description: Fresh Lime Juice that delivers tangy citrus oils. Classic in Margaritas, daiquiris, and mojitos. Provides crisp acidity to balance sweetness.

ingredients.name: Limoncello
ingredients.description: Limoncello is a zesty Italian Lemon Liqueur at 25–30% ABV. Serve it in a Lemon drop or amalfi spritz.

ingredients.name: Liquorice
ingredients.description: Sweet, earthy root flavor used in candies and herbal liqueurs. A Small amount adds depth to syrups and Bitters. Pair with Anise or citrus to keep it lively.

ingredients.name: Luxardo Maraschino
ingredients.description: Maraschino Liqueur is a clear cherry spirit around 24% ABV. Classic in an aviation or Last Word.

ingredients.name: Lychee
ingredients.description: Fragrant tropical fruit with floral, Lychee-perfume sweetness. Lovely in spritzes, Lychee martinis, and tiki riffs.

ingredients.name: Malibu Rum
ingredients.description: Malibu is a coconut-flavored Rum Liqueur by Pernod Ricard, 21% ABV. Great in a piña colada or bahama mama.

ingredients.name: Mango
ingredients.description: Lush, sweet tropical fruit with silky texture. Blends smoothly into daiquiris, smoothies, and spicy Margaritas.

ingredients.name: Maple syrup
ingredients.description: Maple Syrup is a natural sweetener made from reduced maple sap. Its caramelized, woody notes pair well with Whiskey and coffee cocktails. Use sparingly since it is richer than Simple Syrup.

ingredients.name: Maraschino Cherry
ingredients.description:
Sweet preserved cherry commonly used as a garnish. Brings candy-like fruit notes to sours and Old Fashioned riffs.

self-made recipe:
· ingredients: 500g fresh cherries (pitted), 250ml Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 150g of Sugar, 100ml of Water, and a squeeze of Lemon.
· process:
1. Simmer Syrup: combine Sugar, Water, and Lemon Juice in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer until Sugar dissolves.
2. Add Liqueur: stir in the Liqueur and simmer for 3 minutes to take the edge off the alcohol.
3. Heat cherries: add pitted cherries and simmer for another2–3 minutes until slightly tender but still firm.
4. Cool & store: pour into a glass jar, ensuring cherries are submerged. Cool to room temperature before refrigerating.

ingredients.name: Melon Liqueur
ingredients.description: Melon Liqueur is a sweet melon spirit about 20% ABV. Mix it in a Japanese slipper or melon ball.

ingredients.name: Mezcal
ingredients.description: Smoky agave spirit from mexico produced by roasting agave hearts before distillation. Typically 40–55% ABV with earthy, roasted notes. Adds rustic smoke to margarita riffs or neat pours.

ingredients.name: Midori Melon Liqueur
ingredients.description: Midori is a neon-green Japanese Melon Liqueur by suntory, 20% ABV. Use it in a midori sour or Japanese slipper.

ingredients.name: Milk
ingredients.description: Milk is a nutrient-rich dairy liquid produced by mammals. Its mild sweetness and proteins add body, foam, and balance to shaken drinks or coffee cocktails. Choose whole Milk for creaminess or lower-fat Milk for a lighter sip.

ingredients.name: Mint
ingredients.description: Mint is a fragrant herb that provides a cool, refreshing flavor and aromatic lift to countless cocktails, most notably the mojito and Mint julep.

ingredients.name: Nutmeg
ingredients.description: Warm aromatic spice often grated over punches, eggnogs, and tiki drinks.

ingredients.name: Old Tom Gin
ingredients.description: Old Tom Gin is a sweeter style of Gin with 40–45% ABV. It has a softer juniper profile and slight sweetness. Ideal for classic cocktails like the tom collins.

ingredients.name: Olive
ingredients.description: Briny, savory fruit used to garnish martinis and savory cocktails. Adds a salty contrast to crisp spirits.

ingredients.name: Olive Brine
ingredients.description: Olive Brine — or Olive Juice — is simply a mixture of Salt, vinegar and Water but as olives marinate, the liquid takes on a fantastically rich and delicious Olive flavor. That salty goodness is a pungent boost that will deepen the flavor profile in your cooking.

ingredients.name: Oloroso Sherry
ingredients.description: Oloroso Sherry is a fragrant, Dry, oxidatively aged fortified wine from the jerez region of spain, known for its rich, nutty flavours at 15–20% ABV.

ingredients.name: Orange
ingredients.description: The Orange is the fruit of the citrus species citrus × sinensis in the family rutaceae. It is also called sweet Orange, to distinguish it from the related citrus × aurantium, referred to as bitter Orange. The sweet Orange reproduces asexually (apomixis through nucellar embryony); varieties of sweet Orange arise through mutations.

ingredients.name: Orange Bitters
ingredients.description: Orange Bitters are aromatic Bitters flavored with Orange peel and spices. Use a dash or two to add bright citrus and gentle bitterness to stirred cocktails.

ingredients.name: Orange Curaçao
ingredients.description: Orange Curaçao is an Orange Liqueur at 20–40% ABV with bittersweet citrus. Essential in a Mai Tai or Sidecar.

ingredients.name: Orange Flower Water
ingredients.description: Fragrant distillate from Orange blossoms. Just a few drops perfume drinks like the ramos Gin fizz. Overuse can dominate, so measure carefully.

ingredients.name: Orange Juice
ingredients.description: Sweet, sunny citrus Juice with gentle acidity. Popular in brunch cocktails like the mimosa or screwdriver. Adds body and brightness to tropical mixes.

ingredients.name: Orange Liqueur
ingredients.description: Orange Liqueur adds citrus sweetness at roughly 20–40% ABV. Try it in a margarita or cosmopolitan.

ingredients.name: Orange Marmalade
ingredients.description: Orange Marmalade is a sweet citrus preserve that adds a bittersweet flavor.

ingredients.name: Oude Genever
ingredients.description: Traditional Dutch genever made with maltwine and botanicals, around 38–40% ABV. Malty, juniper-forward, and lightly sweet. Works in classic martinez-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Ouzo
ingredients.description: Ouzo (greek: ούζο, ipa: [ˈuzo]) is an Anise-flavoured aperitif that is widely consumed in greece and cyprus. Its taste is similar to other Anise liquors like Pastis, Sambuca, arak, rakı, and mastika, which are traditionally produced and consumed in mediterranean countries.

ingredients.name: Overproof Rum
ingredients.description: Overproof Rum has an ABV of 57% or higher, offering intense flavor and strength. It is used for floats, flaming drinks, and tiki cocktails. Best handled with care.

ingredients.name: Palo Cortado Sherry
ingredients.description: Rare sherry style combining the aroma of amontillado with the body of oloroso. Offers dried fruit, citrus peel, and subtle nutty richness for stirred or fortified cocktails.

ingredients.name: Papaya
ingredients.description: Mild, sweet tropical fruit with buttery texture. Mash or blend it into tiki drinks and tropical highballs.

ingredients.name: Papaya Juice
ingredients.description: Papaya Juice is sweet, tropical, and slightly musky. It pairs well with Rum, Tequila, and tropical liqueurs. Adds smooth texture to exotic cocktails.

ingredients.name: Passion Fruit
ingredients.description: Passion Fruit has a tangy, aromatic tropical flavor. The pulp can be scooped directly into cocktails. Popular in tiki drinks and modern fruity creations.

ingredients.name: Passion fruit juice
ingredients.description: Tangy tropical Juice with floral aroma. Brings sweet-tart punch to tiki drinks and sours. Pairs especially well with Rum, Tequila, and Sparkling Wine.

ingredients.name: Passion Fruit Liqueur
ingredients.description: Passion Fruit Liqueur is a sweet tropical spirit with 15–20% ABV. It has exotic, tangy fruit notes. Works in fruity martinis and tiki blends.

ingredients.name: Passion Fruit Syrup
ingredients.description: Passion Fruit Syrup delivers tropical tartness with perfumed aroma. It brightens tiki cocktails like the hurricane or jamaican classics. Also works in spritzes or sodas when you want sharp fruit acidity.

ingredients.name: Passoa
ingredients.description: Passoã is a Passion Fruit Liqueur from france by rémy Cointreau, 14.9–17% ABV. Use it in a pornstar Martini or hurricane.

ingredients.name: Pastis
ingredients.description: French Anise Liqueur that turns cloudy with Water, about 40–45% ABV. Flavored with licorice and herbs. Commonly served diluted as an aperitif or used in cocktails.

ingredients.name: Peach
ingredients.description: Peaches bring soft, juicy sweetness to cocktails. They can be muddled, juiced, or pureed. Perfect in bellinis and sangrias.

ingredients.name: Peach Bitters
ingredients.description: A Bitters is traditionally an alcoholic preparation flavoured with botanical matter such that the end result is characterised by a bitter, sour, or bittersweet flavour. Numerous longstanding brands of Bitters were originally developed as patent medicines, but are now sold as digestifs and cocktail flavourings.

ingredients.name: Peach Brandy
ingredients.description: Peach-based Brandy or Liqueur with ripe stone-fruit sweetness, typically 30–40% ABV. Sometimes aged for gentle oak warmth. Tasty in punches and cobblers.

ingredients.name: Peach Liqueur
ingredients.description: Peach Liqueur is a sweet stone-fruit spirit around 20% ABV. Delicious in a bellini or sex on the beach.

ingredients.name: Peach Schnapps
ingredients.description: Peach Schnapps is a light Peach spirit about 15–20% ABV. Ideal in a fuzzy navel or woo woo.

ingredients.name: Peppermint Candy
ingredients.description: Sweet peppermint candies that add cool Mint flavor. Crush or melt into syrups for dessert cocktails and hot drinks. Use as a garnish for festive presentations.

ingredients.name: Peppermint Schnapps
ingredients.description: Peppermint Schnapps is a minty spirit at 15–30% ABV. Serve in a peppermint patty or hot Chocolate.

ingredients.name: Pepsi Cola
ingredients.description: Pepsi is a caramel-forward Cola with Vanilla and citrus notes. It adds sweetness, color, and bubbles to Rum or Whiskey mixes. Slightly softer than coke for smoother highballs.

ingredients.name: Pernod
ingredients.description: French Anise spirit similar to Pastis at about 40% ABV. Offers licorice, herbs, and light sweetness. Used in Absinthe-style serves and as a cocktail rinse.

ingredients.name: Peychaud's Bitters
ingredients.description: Peychaud’s Bitters have 35–45% ABV and a floral, Anise-like aroma. Essential in the sazerac cocktail. Adds depth and complexity to many drinks.

ingredients.name: Physalis
ingredients.description: Tangy golden berry with papery husk and citrusy sweetness. Works well as a garnish or muddled into sours.

ingredients.name: Pilsner Lager
ingredients.description: Crisp, golden Lager with gentle hops and clean finish around 4–5% ABV. Light enough for shandies or Beer-based highballs.

ingredients.name: Pimm's No. 1
ingredients.description: Pimm's No. 1 Is a Gin-based fruit cup by Diageo, 25% ABV. Classic in a pimm's cup or summer cup.

ingredients.name: Pineapple
ingredients.description: The Pineapple (ananas comosus) is a tropical plant with an edible multiple fruit consisting of coalesced Berries, also called pineapples, and is the most economically significant plant in the bromeliaceae family.

ingredients.name: Pineapple Juice
ingredients.description: Sweet, tropical Pineapple Juice with natural froth. Key for piña coladas, painkillers, and tiki punches. Provides body, acidity, and aroma when shaken.

ingredients.name: Pineapple Syrup
ingredients.description: Pineapple Syrup is a kind of Simple Syrup that takes advantage of Pineapple's texturizing effect to produce a sweet-and-sour, musky Syrup that is not only a classic tiki ingredient, but also has uses in many early 20th Century cocktails.

ingredients.name: Pink Lemonade
ingredients.description: Pink Lemonade is a Lemon-based soft drink tinted with red fruit. It offers sweet-tart citrus with a hint of berry. Great for spritzes, slushies, or colorful punches.

ingredients.name: Pisang Ambon
ingredients.description: Pisang Ambon is a Dutch green Banana Liqueur by lucas bols, 21% ABV. Great in indonesian-style cocktails or a green fever.

ingredients.name: Pisco
ingredients.description: Pisco is a colourless or yellowish-to-amber colored Brandy produced in the winemaking regions of Peru and Chile. Made by distilling fermented Grape Juice into a high-proof spirit, it was developed by 16th-Century Spanish settlers as an alternative to orujo, a pomace Brandy that was being imported from spain. It had the advantages of being produced from abundant domestically grown fruit and reducing the volume of alcoholic beverages transported to remote locations.

ingredients.name: Plum Brandy
ingredients.description: Plum Brandy is a popular fruit spirit made from fermented plum Juice, widely celebrated in central and southeastern europe. It typically has an alcohol by volume (ABV) ranging from 40% to 50%, though traditional or homemade varieties can be much stronger.

ingredients.name: Pomegranate Juice
ingredients.description: Pomegranate Juice is made from the fruit of the pomegranate. It is used in cooking both as a fresh Juice and as a concentrated Syrup.

ingredients.name: Port
ingredients.description: Port is a fortified portuguese wine at 19–22% ABV with rich sweetness. Use it in a Port flip or New York sour.

ingredients.name: Prosecco
ingredients.description: Prosecco is an Italian Sparkling Wine around 11% ABV with light fruity notes. Perfect for a bellini or spritz.

ingredients.name: Punt e Mes
ingredients.description: Punt e Mes is a bitter Italian Vermouth by carpano, 16% ABV. Mix it in a Negroni or Manhattan variation.

ingredients.name: Raspberry
ingredients.description: Raspberries are sweet-tart Berries with bright color and aroma. Used fresh, muddled, or as puree. Great in Gin, Vodka, and Champagne cocktails.

ingredients.name: Raspberry Liqueur
ingredients.description: Raspberry Liqueur is sweet-tart at about 20% ABV. Shake it into a French Martini or Raspberry collins.

ingredients.name: Raspberry Syrup
ingredients.description: Raspberry Syrup offers vivid berry sweetness with gentle tartness. It provides the signature flavor in clover club and other Gin drinks. Swirl into sodas or desserts for color and aroma.

ingredients.name: Red Bull
ingredients.description: Red Bull is a caffeinated energy drink that adds sweetness and carbonation.

ingredients.name: Red Vermouth
ingredients.description: Red Vermouth is a sweet spiced fortified wine around 15–18% ABV. Essential in a Negroni or Manhattan.

ingredients.name: Red Wine
ingredients.description: Red Wine is a fermented grape wine at 12–15% ABV with tannic fruit notes. Use it in Sangria or a New York sour.

ingredients.name: Rhum Martinique Agricole
ingredients.description: Aoc rhum agricole from martinique distilled from fresh sugarcane Juice, usually 40–55% ABV. Grassy, earthy, and slightly funky. Shines in ti' punch and Daiquiri variations.

ingredients.name: Ricard
ingredients.description: Ricard is a French Pastis by Pernod Ricard at 45% ABV, with intense Anise flavor. Enjoy it in a classic Pastis or mauresque.

ingredients.name: Rich Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Rich Sugar Syrup, or Rich Simple Syrup, is Sugar dissolved in Water 2:1. It blends easily into cocktails and is a bar staple.

ingredients.name: Root Beer
ingredients.description: Root Beer is a sweet north american soft drink traditionally flavored with sassafras or sarsaparilla. It can be caffeinated or not and usually pours with a thick, foamy head. Modern versions are nonalcoholic, carbonated, and use artificial sassafras flavoring.

ingredients.name: Rose Syrup
ingredients.description: Rose Syrup is floral and sweet, capturing fragrant rose petals. A Few drops add aromatic lift to Gin, Vodka, or nonalcoholic spritzes. Use lightly to avoid overpowering other flavors.

ingredients.name: Rosemary
ingredients.description: Rosemary is a woody mediterranean herb with piney, resinous aroma. It adds savory depth to Gin, Whiskey, and citrus cocktails whether infused or used as a garnish. Smack the sprig before serving to release its oils without overwhelming the drink.

ingredients.name: Rosemary Syrup
ingredients.description: A Sugar Syrup made with Rosemary.

ingredients.name: Ruby Port
ingredients.description: Ruby Port is a young red Port wine at 19–20% ABV with fresh berry sweetness. Good in a ruby Manhattan or Port & Tonic.

ingredients.name: Rumple Minze
ingredients.description: German Peppermint Schnapps bottled at 50% ABV. Intensely sweet and cooling. Served ice-cold or mixed into minty cocktails and shots.

ingredients.name: Rye Whiskey
ingredients.description: Whiskey with a rye-heavy mash bill, generally 40–50% ABV. Spicier and drier than Bourbon with peppery finish. Essential for manhattans, sazeracs, and other classics.

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.description: Common seasoning of sodium chloride used to balance sweetness or bitterness in drinks. Often rimming margarita glasses or highlighting citrus-forward cocktails.

ingredients.name: Sambuca
ingredients.description: Sambuca (Italian pronunciation: [samˈbuːka]) is an Italian Anise-flavoured, usually colourless, Liqueur. Its most common variety is often referred to as white Sambuca to differentiate it from other varieties that are deep blue in colour (Black Sambuca) or bright red (red Sambuca). Like other Anise-flavoured liqueurs, the Ouzo effect is sometimes observed when combined with Water.

ingredients.name: Sauvignon Blanc
ingredients.description: Sauvignon Blanc is a popular, Dry White Wine celebrated for its crispness, high acidity, and vibrant flavors ranging from green, herbaceous notes to tropical fruits, depending on where it's grown. It is highly versatile and pairs well with a variety of foods.

ingredients.name: Scotch Highland Whisky
ingredients.description: Single malt scotch from the highlands region, typically 40–46% ABV. Flavors range from honeyed malt to gentle smoke. Versatile for sipping or cocktails.

ingredients.name: Scotch Whisky
ingredients.description: Whisky made in scotland and aged at least three years in oak at 40% ABV or higher. Styles span light and floral to heavily peated. Classic base for highballs and stirred drinks.

ingredients.name: Seagram's 7 Crown
ingredients.description: Seagram's seven crown, also called Seagram's seven, or simply seven crown, is an american blended Whiskey produced by Diageo under the Seagram's name.

ingredients.name: Select
ingredients.description: Aperitivo Select is a classic, bittersweet Italian aperitif from venice, known as the essential ingredient for the original venetian spritz, featuring complex notes from 30 botanicals. Select aperitivo has an alcohol by volume (ABV) of 17.5%.

ingredients.name: Silver Onion
ingredients.description: Pearl onions are sometimes used as savory cocktail garnishes. The gibson cocktail famously uses pickled onions. Adds a sharp, tangy bite.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Sugar Syrup, or Simple Syrup, is Sugar dissolved in Water 1:1. It blends easily into cocktails and is a bar staple.

ingredients.name: Sloe Gin
ingredients.description: Sloe Gin is a tart sloe berry Liqueur at 15–30% ABV. Classic in a Sloe Gin fizz or charlie chaplin.

ingredients.name: Soda Water
ingredients.description: Carbonated Water that lightens and lengthens cocktails. Adds effervescence without extra Sugar. Serve well-chilled for the best bubbles.

ingredients.name: Southern Comfort
ingredients.description: American Liqueur of neutral spirit blended with fruit, spice, and Whiskey flavor, about 35% ABV. Created in new orleans in 1874. Easy-drinking base for punches and southern-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Sparkling Wine
ingredients.description: Sparkling Wine is effervescent wine about 11–13% ABV. Enjoy it in a mimosa or bellini.

ingredients.name: Spiced Rum
ingredients.description: Rum infused with spices like Vanilla, Cinnamon, and clove, typically 35–40% ABV. Sweet and aromatic with amber color. Great in tiki drinks, colas, and warm punches.

ingredients.name: Sprite
ingredients.description: Sprite is a caffeine-free Lemon-Lime Soda with bright citrus fizz. Provides sweetness and effervescence without heavy flavors. Reliable mixer for Vodka, Gin, or Whiskey highballs.

ingredients.name: St. Germain
ingredients.description: ST-germain is a French elderflower Liqueur by bacardi, 20% ABV. Use it in a st-germain spritz or elderflower collins.

ingredients.name: Strawberry
ingredients.description: The garden Strawberry is a widely grown hybrid species of the genus fragaria, collectively known as the strawberries. It is cultivated worldwide for its fruit. The fruit is widely appreciated for its characteristic aroma, bright red color, juicy texture, and sweetness.

ingredients.name: Strawberry Liqueur
ingredients.description: Strawberry Liqueur is sweet and fruity around 20% ABV. Try it in a Strawberry Daiquiri.

ingredients.name: Strawberry Schnapps
ingredients.description: Strawberry Schnapps is a sugary Strawberry spirit about 15–20% ABV. Great in a Strawberry Martini or red lebowski.

ingredients.name: Strawberry Syrup
ingredients.description: Strawberry Syrup is a sweet, fruity liquid that enhances cocktails with berry flavor. Ideal for summer drinks and lemonades.

ingredients.name: Strucchi Bitter
ingredients.description: Campari-style Liqueur with a rich, persistent 27% ABV profile. Made from herbs, roots, and citrus peels that bring rhubarb, gentian, and cinchona notes. Finishes long with hints of aloe and germander.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food.

ingredients.name: Suze
ingredients.description: Suze is a French gentian aperitif by Pernod Ricard, 20% ABV, with bitter herbal notes. Mix it in a white Negroni or Suze & Tonic.

ingredients.name: Tabasco
ingredients.description: Tabasco is a hot pepper sauce that adds spice and acidity to cocktails. IT’s essential in bloody marys.

ingredients.name: Tawny Port
ingredients.description: Tawny Port is barrel-aged portuguese Port around 19–20% ABV with nutty caramel flavors. Use it in a Port Old Fashioned or bishop.

ingredients.name: Tequila Añejo
ingredients.description: Tequila aged 1–3 years in oak, about 40% ABV. Smooth agave spirit with Vanilla, caramel, and spice notes. Sip neat or use in spirit-forward cocktails.

ingredients.name: Tequila Blanco
ingredients.description: Tequila Blanco is an unaged Mexican agave spirit with 38–40% ABV. It has fresh, grassy, and peppery notes.

ingredients.name: Tequila Gold
ingredients.description: Tequila Gold is a blended or lightly aged Tequila with 38–40% ABV. It has a smoother, slightly caramel flavor.

ingredients.name: Tequila Reposado
ingredients.description: Tequila Reposado, meaning ."rested," is a type of Tequila aged in oak barrels for a minimum of two months to a maximum of one year, bridging the gap between unaged Blanco and aged Añejo. This ageing process imparts a golden hue and a smoother, more complex flavour with notes of wood, Vanilla, or fruit, making it versatile for sipping neat, on the rocks, or in cocktails like Margaritas.

ingredients.name: Tia Maria
ingredients.description: Coffee Liqueur from jamaica made with Rum, Coffee Beans, and Vanilla, around 20% ABV. Smooth and sweet with rich Espresso notes. Used in Espresso martinis and dessert cocktails.

ingredients.name: Tomato Juice
ingredients.description: Tomato Juice is a Juice made from tomatoes, usually used as a beverage, either plain or in cocktails such as a bloody mary or michelada.

ingredients.name: Tonic
ingredients.description: Tonic Water (or indian Tonic Water) is a carbonated soft drink in which quinine is dissolved. Originally used as a prophylactic against malaria, Tonic Water usually now has a significantly lower quinine content and is consumed for its distinctive bitter flavour. It is often used in mixed drinks, particularly in Gin and Tonic.

ingredients.name: Triple Sec
ingredients.description: Triple Sec is a clear Orange Liqueur at 20–40% ABV with bright citrus. Essential in a margarita or Sidecar.

ingredients.name: Vanilla
ingredients.description: Sweet floral bean used to infuse spirits or syrups with mellow bakery notes.

ingredients.name: Vanilla Extract
ingredients.description: Concentrated Vanilla flavoring; a few drops round out creamy or dessert-style cocktails.

ingredients.name: Vanilla Syrup
ingredients.description: Vanilla Syrup infuses Simple Syrup with warm Vanilla bean flavor. It softens sharp spirits and rounds out coffee or Espresso cocktails. Drizzle in Whipped Cream drinks or soda floats.

ingredients.name: Vodka
ingredients.description: Neutral spirit distilled from grains or potatoes and filtered for a clean taste, usually around 40% ABV. Clear and versatile for mixing. Backbone of martinis, bloody marys, and countless cocktails.

ingredients.name: Vodka Citron
ingredients.description: Lemon-flavored Vodka typically bottled around 40% ABV. Bright citrus aroma and a clean finish. Ideal for Cosmopolitans, spritzes, and other refreshing drinks.

ingredients.name: Vodka Vanilla
ingredients.description: Vanilla-flavored Vodka around 35–40% ABV. Adds smooth sweetness and Vanilla bean aroma. Great in dessert cocktails or with Cola and Cream sodas.

ingredients.name: Water
ingredients.description: Water is a neutral, odorless liquid used for dilution and ice. Balance cocktails by adding Water through shaking, stirring, or dilution. Fresh, clean Water keeps flavors bright.

ingredients.name: Whipped Cream
ingredients.description: Whipped Cream is Cream beaten until light and fluffy, often sweetened and flavored with Vanilla. It doubles in volume as air is incorporated, creating a soft foam. Use it as a rich topping for coffee cocktails, hot drinks, and dessert serves.

ingredients.name: Whiskey
ingredients.description: Whisky or Whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash. Various grains (which may be malted) are used for different varieties, including barley, corn (maize), rye, and wheat. Whisky is typically aged in wooden casks, generally made of charred white oak.

ingredients.name: Whiskey Cream
ingredients.description: Whiskey Cream is a creamy Liqueur blending Whiskey with dairy and sweetness. It brings a smooth, dessert-like richness to cocktails and after-dinner drinks.

ingredients.name: Whiskey-Barrel Aged Bitters
ingredients.description: Bitters aged in Whiskey barrels for Vanilla and oak notes. Adds depth to old fashioneds and Whiskey sours with minimal effort. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering lighter spirits.

ingredients.name: White Rum
ingredients.description: Light Rum with subtle sweetness, often filtered clear after aging, around 40% ABV. Clean flavor for mixing without heavy molasses. Standard choice for daiquiris and mojitos.

ingredients.name: White Wine
ingredients.description: White Wine is a crisp fermented grape wine at 11–13% ABV. Enjoy it in a spritzer or kir.

ingredients.name: Wild Turkey
ingredients.description: Wild Turkey is a brand of kentucky straight Bourbon Whiskey distilled and bottled by the austin nichols division of Campari group. The distillery is located near lawrenceburg, kentucky, united states.

ingredients.name: Worcestershire Sauce
ingredients.description: Worcestershire Sauce is a fermented liquid condiment originally created by chemists john wheeley lea and william henry perrins in worcester, england. It features a complex, savory flavor profile and is a staple in many classic cocktails, most notably the bloody mary.

ingredients.name: Yellow Chartreuse
ingredients.description: Milder 40% ABV sibling to Green Chartreuse made by carthusian monks with 130 herbs. Honeyed, saffron-tinged herbal sweetness. Excellent in cocktails needing softer herbal notes.

ingredients.name: Yukon Jack
ingredients.description: Yukon Jack is a Liqueur advertised as the ."Black sheep of Canadian Liquors". It is a 100 proof (in USA) or 80 proof (in Canada) drink, made from Canadian Whisky and Honey. The taste is sweeter than straight Whisky and Bourbon, due to the Honey that is added.

ingredients.name: Żubrówka
ingredients.description: Żubrówka is a Polish Bison grass Vodka with 37–40% ABV. It has a unique herbal, Vanilla-like aroma.

ingredients.name: Pedro Ximenez Sherry
ingredients.description: Pedro Ximénez is a sweet Spanish sherry around 15–18% ABV with raisin notes. Try it in a px flip or Espresso Martini twist.
